title: Static Analysis

android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.description: Allows an application to show system-alert windows. Malicious applications can take over the entire screen of the phone.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.description: Allows application to access the audio record path.

android.permission.CAMERA.description: Allows application to take pictures and videos with the camera. This allows the application to collect images that the camera is seeing at any time.

android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS.description: Allows an application to access the list of accounts known by the phone.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

Service (com.google.android.gms.auth.api.signin.RevocationBoundService) is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.
Permission: com.google.android.gms.auth.api.signin.permission.REVOCATION_NOTIFICATION
[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: A Service is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to normal or dangerous, a malicious application can request and obtain the permission and interact with the component. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.
manifest_analysis.name: is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.[android:exported=true]

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "On Android 5.1, you will get System UI Crash if you select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog.

It is a problem of Android 5.1. Therefore the only way to solve it is reinstall AZ Screen Recorder and remember to not select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Incompatible resolution maybe cause bug like that, so we recommend you to reduce resolution for better recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converting video to GIF with too many frames or too high quality may cause crash.

For control total frames, please select a combination of FPS and length, which gives less than 150 frames.

We recommend to select normal quality (less than 7) and 0.5 scale size."
"crashes_errors_question_1" : "Why do I get System UI crash on Android 5.1?"
"crashes_errors_question_2" : "Why does app crash immediately after start recording?"
"crashes_errors_question_4" : "Why did I get crash while converting video to GIF?"
"device_not_support_overlay" : "Your device not support Draw over other apps"

"dialog_already_have_premium_msg" : "If you bought premium version, you can use it on all your devices. Please open Settings of device - Accounts and Sign in with the Google Account that was used for purchase. Then go to Google Play Store and install the app. If you are having issues with your premium purchase please contact us for support."

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Yes, if you bought premium version, you can use it on all Android 5.0+ devices.

To use premium version on a new device, please open Settings of device - Accounts and sign in with the Google Account that was used for purchase. Then go to Google Play Store and install AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Here is the procedure of getting premium version back: 

STEP 1. Please open Settings of your device and make sure that you signed in with the main Google Account, which was used for purchase. If you did not, please sign in and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. 

STEP 2. If first step doesn't help, please check: How many Google Accounts are there in Settings of your device? If there is only one, please clear data of Google Play Store and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. If there are several Accounts, please remove all of them except the main Account. Then reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. When you get premium version back, you can add the removed Accounts back. 

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "We apply 3 days refund policy. If you are still in the 3 days trial period and you want a refund, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Remember to give us your order details including order ID and purchase time."
"donate_upgrade_question_1" : "Can I use premium version on different devices?"
"donate_upgrade_question_2" : "I lost premium version. How can I get it back?"

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "If you are using Android 4.4 or lower, you cannot download AZ Screen Recorder. Our app is only available for devices running Android 5.0 or higher.

If you are using Android 5.0+, maybe your device is in our blacklist. Your device has many problems with screen recording, so we temporarily remove it from list of supported devices.

If you still want to try AZ Screen Recorder, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "If you enabled Show touches in AZ Screen Recorder, it will work after opening app and stop working after exit app. 

We consider that app is exited if user clicks the EXIT (4th) button of the floating control bar. 

In case AZ Screen Recorder is not exited normally and the Show touches continues working, you can disable it by going to Developer Options in Settings of your phone"

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "On some Xiaomi, Meizu… devices POP-UP WINDOW is disabled by default. Therefore the floating control bar of AZ Screen Recorder cannot be shown.

Please open AppInfo of AZ Screen Recorder and grant the POP-UP WINDOW (Alert) permisson>"

"other_faqs_question_3" : "Why can't I open AZ Screen Recorder on Xiaomi, Meizu devices?"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Please open Settings - Video Configuration - Orientation. If you plan to record games or other apps with landscape screen, please set Video orientation to Landscape.

If you select Auto orientation, the orientation of recorded video will depend on screen orientation at the moment of start recording."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google doesn't provide API for recording internal audio on Android 5.0 or higher. Therefore currently AZ Screen Recorder only supports recording sound via microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google doesn't allow to access microphone in parallel. That means the Video call app and AZ Screen Recorder can not record sound at same time."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "If you try to record a movie of an entertainment app (like Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), you might get a blank video with audio only.

It is the copy right issue.These apps can prevent users from screen recording to protect their content."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "If you cannot open recorded video with any media player, that means recorded video is corrupted. The most common reason is system killed the record-service.

While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "It seems to be a problem of your ROM. Somehow the screencast feature doesn't work.

Please open Settings - Encoder and enable Fix green screen mode. You also should try to record with different resolutions.

If you still get this problem, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com for support."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "It seems to be a problem of WhatsApp's video compression. WhatsApp compresses videos before sharing them. This process ruins some videos. If you can upload videos to YouTube, Facebook without problems, that means the recorded videos are fine.

You should contact WhatsApp to report the problem of video compression."
"video_audio_question_2" : "Why cannot I record system audio (internal sound, game sound)?"
"video_audio_question_3" : "Why is there no sound (audio) when I record a video call?"
"video_audio_question_4" : "Why did I get blank videos with only audio when I record films?"
"video_audio_question_6" : "Why do I always get videos with green screen?"
"video_audio_question_7" : "Why are some videos ruined after sharing via WhatsApp?"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "On Android 5.1, you will get System UI Crash if you select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog.

It is a problem of Android 5.1. Therefore the only way to solve it is reinstall AZ Screen Recorder and remember to not select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Incompatible resolution maybe cause bug like that, so we recommend you to reduce resolution for better recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converting video to GIF with too many frames or too high quality may cause crash.

For control total frames, please select a combination of FPS and length, which gives less than 150 frames.

We recommend to select normal quality (less than 7) and 0.5 scale size."

"crashes_errors_question_2" : "Why does app crash immediately after start recording?"
"crashes_errors_question_4" : "Why did I get crash while converting video to GIF?"

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Yes, if you bought premium version, you can use it on all Android 5.0+ devices.

To use premium version on a new device, please open Settings of device - Accounts and sign in with the Google Account that was used for purchase. Then go to Google Play Store and install AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Here is the procedure of getting premium version back: 

STEP 1. Please open Settings of your device and make sure that you signed in with the main Google Account, which was used for purchase. If you did not, please sign in and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. 

STEP 2. If first step doesn't help, please check: How many Google Accounts are there in Settings of your device? If there is only one, please clear data of Google Play Store and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. If there are several Accounts, please remove all of them except the main Account. Then reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. When you get premium verison back, you can add the removed Accounts back. 

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "We apply 3 days refund policy. If you are still in the 3 days trial period and you want a refund, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Remember to give us your order details including order ID and purchase time."
"donate_upgrade_question_1" : "Can I use premium version on different devices?"
"donate_upgrade_question_2" : "I lost premium version. How can I get it back?"

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "If you are using Android 4.4 or lower, you cannot download AZ Screen Recorder. Our app is only available for devices running Android 5.0 or higher.

If you are using Android 5.0+, maybe your device is in our blacklist. Your device has many problems with screen recording, so we temporarily remove it from list of supported devices.

If you still want to try AZ Screen Recorder, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "If you enabled Show touches in AZ Screen Recorder, it will work after opening app and stop working after exit app. 

We consider that app is exited if user clicks the EXIT (4th) button of the floating control bar. 

In case AZ Screen Recorder is not exited normally and the Show touches continues working, you can disable it by going to Developer Options in Settings of your phone"

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "On some Xiaomi, Meizu… devices POP-UP WINDOW is disabled by default. Therefore the floating control bar of AZ Screen Recorder cannot be shown.

Please open AppInfo of AZ Screen Recorder and grant the POP-UP WINDOW (Alert) permisson>"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Please open Settings - Video Configuration - Orientation. If you plan to record games or other apps with landscape screen, please set Video orientation to Landscape.

If you select Auto orientation, the orientation of recorded video will depend on screen orientation at the moment of start recording."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google doesn't provide API for recording internal audio on Android 5.0 or higher. Therefore currently AZ Screen Recorder only supports recording sound via microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google doesn't allow to access microphone in parallel. That means the Video call app and AZ Screen Recorder can not record sound at same time."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "If you try to record a movie of an entertainment app (like Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), you might get a blank video with audio only.

It is the copy right issue.These apps can prevent users from screen recording to protect their content."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "If you cannot open recorded video with any media player, that means recorded video is corrupted. The most common reason is system killed the record-service.

While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "It seems to be a problem of your ROM. Somehow the screencast feature doesn't work.

Please open Settings - Encoder and enable Fix green screen mode. You also should try to record with different resolutions.

If you still get this problem, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com for support."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "It seems to be a problem of WhatsApp's video compression. WhatsApp compresses videos before sharing them. This process ruins some videos. If you can upload videos to Youtube, Facebook without problems, that means the recorded videos are fine.

You should contact WhatsApp to report the problem of video compression."

"video_audio_question_7" : "Why are some videos ruined after sharing via WhatsApp?"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "Android 5.1では、画面キャプチャの権限ダイアログで 「次回から表示しない」を選択すると、システム UI のクラッシュが起こります。

これは Android 5.1の問題です。この問題を解決する唯一の方法は、AZ スクリーン レコーダーを再インストールし、画面キャプチャの権限ダイアログで 「次回から表示しない」を選択しないようにすることです。"
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "選択したエンコーダの種類を確認してください。「通常」は一部の端末では正常に動作しません。その場合、エンコーダに「高度」を選択してください。"

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "画面録画中、録画サービスがバックグラウンドで実行され、フォアグラウンドで実行中の他のアプリよりも低い優先度で動いています。

画面録画は重いタスクで大量のリソースを要するため、端末のシステムがメモリやバッテリ、他の高優先度のアプリのリソースを確保するために録画サービスを終了する場合があります。

より安定した録画のために、解像度やビットレート、動画の長さを減らすことを推奨します。"

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "大量のフレームや高い品質でGIF変換を行った場合、アプリがクラッシュする場合があります。

総フレーム数が150を超えないように、FPS と動画の長さの組み合わせを調整してください。

品質を標準的な値（7未満）にし、大きさを0.5にセットすることを推奨します。"

"crashes_errors_question_4" : "GIF変換の使用中にクラッシュしてしまいます。"

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "はい、プレミアム版を購入すればすべての Android 5.0以降の端末で利用できます。

新たな端末でプレミアム版を利用するためには、端末の設定 - アカウント を開き、プレミアム版を購入した Google アカウントでサインインしてください。その後で Play ストアを開き、AZ スクリーン レコーダーをインストールしてください。"

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Hプレミアム版を取り戻す手順は以下の通りです: 

STEP 1. 端末の設定 - アカウント を開き、プレミアム版を購入した Google アカウントでサインインしていることを確認してください。していない場合、プレミアム版を購入した Google アカウントでサインインし、AZ スクリーン レコーダーを再インストールしてください。 

STEP 2. STEP 1 では解決しないなら、次のことを確認してください: 端末の設定には Google アカウントがいくつありますか？ 1つだけなら、Play ストアのデータを消去し、AZ スクリーン レコーダーを再インストールしてください。 複数ある場合、メインアカウント以外の Google アカウントを取り除き、AZ スクリーン レコーダーを再インストールしてください。この操作でプレミアム版が取り戻せたら、取り除いたアカウントを登録しなおしても構いません。 

STEP 3. いずれの手順を試してもプレミアム版を取り戻せない場合、az.screen.recorder@gmail.com までご連絡ください。"

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "3日間の返金ポリシーが適用されます。試用期間の3日間以内であって返金を受けたい場合、az.screen.recorder@gmail.com までご連絡ください。

連絡の際には、注文番号と注文日時をお伝えください。"

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "Android 4.4以前の端末では、AZ スクリーン レコーダーをダウンロードできません。このアプリはAndroid 5.0以降の端末のみダウンロードできます。

Android 5.0以降の端末をお使いの場合、おそらくお使いの端末が当社のブラックリストに登録されています。お使いの端末では画面録画に多くの問題があるため、対応端末のリストから一時的に削除しています。

それでも AZ スクリーン レコーダーをお使いになりたい場合、az.screen.recorder@gmail.com までEメールをお送りください。"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "タップを表示を AZ スクリーン レコーダーで有効にした場合、アプリを開いた後でタップが表示され、アプリを終了するとタップが表示されなくなります。 

画面上に表示されるコントロールバーの終了ボタン（左から4つ目のボタン）が押されたことで、アプリが終了されたとみなされます。 

AZ スクリーン レコーダーが正常に終了されず、タップを表示が動き続けている場合、端末の設定にある開発者向けオプションから無効にできます。"

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "Xiaomi、Meizu 端末ではデフォルトでポップアップウィンドウが無効化されています。そのため AZ スクリーン レコーダーの、画面上に表示されるコントロールバーが表示できません。

AZ スクリーン レコーダーのアプリ情報を開き、ポップアップウィンドウ（警告）権限を許可してください。"
"other_faqs_question_1" : "AZ スクリーン レコーダーが、持っている端末と互換性がないのはなぜですか？"

"other_faqs_question_3" : "Xiaomi、Meizu の端末で AZ スクリーン レコーダーが開けません。"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "設定 - 動画設定 - 画面の向きを開いてください。横画面で表示されるゲームやアプリを録画する場合、画面の向きを「横向き」に設定してください。

画面の向きに「自動」を選択した場合、録画される動画の向きは録画開始時の画面の向きによって決まります。"
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google がAndroid 5.0以降で内部の音を録音するための API を提供していないため、AZ スクリーン レコーダーは現在マイクによる音声の録音のみサポートしています。"
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google がマイクへの並行したアクセスを許可していないため、ビデオ通話アプリと AZ スクリーン レコーダーは同時に音声を録音することができません。"

"video_audio_answer_4" : "エンターテイメントアプリ（Netflix、Telly、OSN Play など）の映画を録画した場合、音声のみ録音された空の動画が録画される場合があります。

これは著作権上の問題です。これらのアプリはコンテンツ保護のために、画面録画ができないようにしています。"

"video_audio_answer_5" : "録画した動画がどのメディアプレイヤーでも開けない場合、動画が破損しています。よくある原因は録画サービスがシステムによって終了されることです。

画面録画中、録画サービスがバックグラウンドで実行され、フォアグラウンドで実行中の他のアプリよりも低い優先度で動いています。

画面録画は重いタスクで大量のリソースを要するため、端末のシステムがメモリやバッテリ、他の高優先度のアプリのリソースを確保するために録画サービスを終了する場合があります。

より安定した録画のために、解像度やビットレート、動画の長さを減らすことを推奨します。"

"video_audio_answer_6" : "Iお使いの端末の ROM に問題があるようです。何らかの原因で画面のキャスト機能が動作していません。

メーカーに問い合わせ、この問題を伝えてください。"

"video_audio_answer_7" : "WhatsApp の動画圧縮による問題のようです。WhatsApp は動画を圧縮した上で共有します。この過程で一部の動画が破損することがあります。Youtube や Facebook に問題なく動画をアップロードできる場合、録画した動画には問題がありません。

WhatsApp に問い合わせ、動画圧縮の問題について伝えてください。"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "안드로이드 5.1에서, 녹화시 “다시 보지 않음” 체크박스를 클릭하면 시스템 UI가 깨집니다.

안드로이드 5.1의 문제로, AZ 스크린 레코더를 삭제후 재설치하신 다음, 녹화시 “다시 보지 않음” 체크박스를 클릭하지 않으시면 됩니다."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "어떤 인코더를 선택했는지 확인해주세요. 기본 인코더는 몇몇 기기에서 작동하지 않습니다. 그런 경우에는, 고급 인코더로 바꿔주세요."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "만약 녹화된 동영상을 어떤 비디오 재생 앱으로도 열 수 없다면, 비디오가 망가졌다는 뜻입니다.

 가장 주요한 원인 중 하나는 녹화 서비스가 다른 실행중인 앱보다 우선권이 떨어질 때 시스템이 녹화 서비스를 강제 중지시켰을 때입니다.

 녹화는 많은 컴퓨터 자원을 필요로 하므로, 가끔씩 시스템이 배터리나 메모리(사용가능한 램 용량)확보 등을 위해 서비스를 강제 중지시킬 수 있습니다.

 녹화 해상도를 줄이거나, 전송률을 낮추거나, 비디오 녹화 시간을 낮추는 걸 권장합니다."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "변환되는 동영상의 해상도가 너무 높거나 전송률이 높으면 충돌을 일으킬 수 있습니다.

총 프레임수 조절을 위해 FPS와 길이를 설정해 150프레임보다 낮도록 해주세요.

저희는 보통 품질 (7보다 낮음) 과 0.5 스케일 사이즈를 추천합니다."

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "네. 프리미엄 버전을 구매한다면, 당신의 모든 안드로이드 5.0+ 기기에서 사용 가능합니다. 

 다른 기기에서 사용하려면, 다른 기기에서 프리미엄 버전을 구매한 구글 계정으로 로그인한 다음, 그 계정으로 Google Play 스토어에서 AZ 스크린 레코더를 다운로드해 주세요."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "프리미엄 버전 적용을 하는 방법입니다. 

STEP 1. 기기 설정에 들어간 다음, 프리미엄 버전 구매에 사용되었던 구글 계정이 메인 계정인지 확인해주세요. 메인 계정이 아니라면, 로그인 후 AZ 스크린 레코더를 삭제 후 재설치해주세요. 

STEP 2. 첫 번째 방법이 도움이 되지 않았다면, 몇 개의 구글 계정이 기기에 로그인되어있는지 화인해주세요. 계정이 하나라면, 구글 플레이 스토어의 데이터를 제거한 후, AZ 스크린 레코더를 재설치해주세요. 계정이 여러 개라면, 프리미엄 버전을 구매한 계정 이외의 계정을 삭제한 다음, AZ 스크린 레코더를 재설치해주세요. 프리미엄 버전을 얻었다면, 계정들을 다시 추가해도 됩니다. 

STEP 3. 두 방법이 모두 도움이 되지 않았다면, az.screen.recorder@gmail.com 으로 연락해주세요."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "우리는 3일동안의 환불 정책이 있습니다. 만약 아직 3일 시험 기간이고, 환불을 원하신다면, az.screen.recorder@gmail.com 으로 연락해주세요. 

주문 기록과 주문 ID, 주문 시간을 알려주는 걸 잊지 마세요."

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "만약 당신이 기기가 안드로이드 5.0보다 낮은 버전을 사용한다면, AZ 스크린 레코더를 다운로드할 수 없습니다. 우리의 앱은 안드로이드 5.0 이상의 기기만 지원합니다. 

만약 당신의 기기가 안드로이드 5.0 이상이라면, 당신의 기기가 저희 블랙리스트에 올라있을 지도 모릅니다. 당신의 기기가 녹화 중 문제가 생기기 때문에, 일시적으로 지원되는 기기 목록에서 제외시켰을지도 모릅니다.

AZ 스크린 레코더를 이용해보고 싶으시다면, az.screen.recorder@gmail.com 으로 연락해주세요/"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "만약 AZ 스크린 레코더에서 터치를 보도록 설정해놓았다면, 앱을 켤 때 작동되고, 앱을 끌 때 작동되지 않을 것입니다. 

저희는 현재 터치 기능을 컨트롤 바의 종료 버튼을 누르면 종료되도록 설정할 계획입니다. 

만약 AZ 스크린 레코더가 비정상적으로 종료되고 터치한 곳이 계속 보인다면, 기기의 설정 - 개발자 옵션에 가서 비활성화해주세요."

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "몇몇 샤오미, 메이주 기기에서는 팝업 윈도우가 기본적으로 비활성화되어있습니다.

AZ 스크린 레코더의 앱 정보에 들어가서 팝업 윈도우 (Alert) 권한을 얻어주세요."

"video_audio_answer_1" : "설정 - VIDEO 환경설정 - 동영상 회전 으로 가주세요. 게임이나 다른 앱을 가로로 녹화하려면, 동영상 회전을 가로로 설정해주세요.

만약 자동 회전을 선택한다면, 녹화된 비디오의 동영상 회전 방향은 시작할 때의 회전 방향으로 설정됩니다."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google이 내부 소리를 녹음하기 위한 API를 제공하지 않았기 때문에 현재는 마이크를 통한 녹음만 가능합니다."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google은 마이크를 2개 이상의 앱이 사용하는 것을 금지합니다. 즉, 영상통화나 통화 등으로 마이크를 사용 중일 때에는 AZ 스크린 레코더로 마이크를 사용할 수 없습니다."
"video_audio_answer_4" : "만약 엔터테인먼트 앱을 통한 영화를 녹화하려 한다면, 저작권 문제 때문에 녹화가 제지될 수 있습니다."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "만약 녹화된 동영상을 어떤 비디오 재생 앱으로도 열 수 없다면, 비디오가 망가졌다는 뜻입니다.

 가장 주요한 원인 중 하나는 녹화 서비스가 다른 실행중인 앱보다 우선권이 떨어질 때 시스템이 녹화 서비스를 강제 중지시켰을 때입니다.

 녹화는 많은 컴퓨터 자원을 필요로 하므로, 가끔씩 시스템이 배터리나 메모리(사용가능한 램 용량)확보 등을 위해 서비스를 강제 중지시킬 수 있습니다.

 녹화 해상도를 줄이거나, 전송률을 낮추거나, 비디오 녹화 시간을 낮추는 걸 권장합니다."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "당신의 ROM문제인 것 같습니다.

 스크린캐스트 기능이 작동하지 않을 수도 있습니다. 기기 제조사와 연락해보세요."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "WhatsApp의 비디오 압축 문제인 것 같습니다. 이 과정은 비디오를 망칠 수 있습니다. 만약 그 동영상을 유튜브에 올리거나, 페이스북으로 공유할 때 아무 문제가 없으면, 동영상은 정상이란 뜻입니다.

 WhatsApp에 문제를 제기하세요."

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "Pe Android 5.1, o să primești Sistemul UI s-a oprit dacă selectezi Nu mai arăta în dialogul de acordare a permisiei de captură.

Este o problemă legată de Android 5.1. Prin urmare singura cale de rezolvare este reinstalarea AZ Screen Recorder. Să ai grijă să nu bifezi Nu mai arăta în dialogul de permisie a capturii."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Rezoluția incompatibilă poate cauza asta, așa că îți recomandăm să schimbi rezolutia."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "În timpul înregistrării, procesul de înregistare rulează în background și are o prioritate scăzută față de alte aplicații.

Înregistarea ecranului este o sarcină foarte dificilă ce consumă o parte mare din resurse. Prin urmare, uneori, sistemul tău trebuie să închidă procesul de înregistare pentru a salva memorie, baterie și alte resurse pentru aplicațiile cu prioritate mai mare.

Recomandăm să scazi rezoluția, bitrate-ul și lungimea videoclipului pentru o stabilitate mai mare."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Convertirea videoclipului în GIF cu prea multe frame-uri sau cu calitate prea mare poate cauza crash.

Pentru a controla frame-urile totale, te rog selectează o combinație de FPS-uri și lungime, care să produca mai puțin de 150 frame-uri.

Recomandăm să selectezi calitatea normală (mai puțin decât 7) și 0.5 mărimea scalării."

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Da, dacă ai cumpărat versiunea premium, o poți folosii pe toate dispozitivele cu Android 5.0+.

Pentru a folosii versiunea premium pe un alt dispozitiv, te rog intră în Setările dispozitivului - Conturi și loghează-te în contul de Google folosit la cumpărarea versiunii premium. După intră in Magazin Google Play și instalează ultima versiune de AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Aici este procedura de recuperare a versiunii premium: 

PASUL 1. Te rog deschide Setările dispozitivului tău și asigura-te că ești logat cu contul principal de Google, care a fost folosit pentru cumpărare. Dacă nu ești, te rog loghează-te și reinstalează AZ Screen Recorder. 

PASUL 2. Dacă primul pas nu te ajuta, te rog verifică: Câte conturi de Google ai in Setările dispozitivului. Dacă este doar unul, te rog șterge datele aplicației Magazin Google Play și reinstalează AZ Screen Recorder. Dacă sunt mai multe conturi, te rog șterge-le pe toate înafară de contul principal după care a fost facută achizitia. După care reinstalează AZ Screen Recorder. După ce îți iei versiunea premium, poți adăuga conturile înapoi. 

STEP 3. Dacă ambii pași de mai sus nu te ajută, contactează-ne la az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "Ai o perioada de 3 zile în care îți poți restituii banii, conform politicii de restituire. Dacă te aflii în primele 3 zile (de la cumpărare) și vrei o restituire, te rog trimite-ne un email la az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Aduți aminte să ne trimiți detaliile comenzii, inclusiv ID-ul comenzii și data."

"donate_upgrade_question_2" : "Am pierdut versiunea premium. Cum o pot recupera?"

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "Dacă folosești Android 4.4 sau mai jos, nu poți descărca AZ Screen Recorder. Aplicația noastră este compatibilă doar cu Android 5.0 sau mai mare.

Dacă folosești Android 5.0+, se poate ca dispozitivul tău să fie pe lista neagră. Dispozitivul tău are multe probleme cu înregistarea ecranului, așa că l-am eliminat din lista de dispozitive suportate.

Dacă încă vrei să folosești AZ Screen Recorder, trimite-ne un email la az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "Dacă ai activat Afișați atingerile în AZ Screen Recorder, va funcționa după deshiderea aplicației și se va oprii după închiderea aplicației. 

Considerăm că aplicația este închisă dacă utilizatorul a apăsat butonul de ieșire (al 4-lea) de pe controller-ul de tip bară. 

În cazul în care AZ Screen Recorder nu este închis normal, iar Afișați atingerile continuă să functioneze, poți să le dezactivezi întrând în Opțiuni dezvoltator în setările dispozitivului tău."

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "Pe unele dispozitive Xiaomi și Meizu… POP-UP WINDOW este dezactivată din fabrică. Prin urmare controller-ul de tip bară al AZ Screen Recorder nu poate fi afișat.

Te rog deschide AppInfo al apliației AZ Screen Recorder și acordă permisia POP-UP WINDOW (Alert) >"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Te rog intră în Setări - Configurări video - Orientare. Dacă vrei să înregistrezi un joc sau o aplicație în Landscape (culcat), te rog setează orientarea video Landscape.

Dacă ai selectat Orientare automată, orientarea înregistării va fi orientarea ecranului din momentul în care ai pornit înregistrarea.."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google nu a oferit un API prin care să putem face asta pentru versiunile de Android 5.1+. Din cauza asta, AZ Screen Recorder suportă doar înregistrarea microfonului."

"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google nu oferă acces ca două aplicații să folosească microfonul în același timp. Asta înseamnă că aplicația de Apel Video și AZ Screen Recorder nu pot înregistra sunet în același timp."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "Dacă încerci să înregistrezi un film dintr-o aplicație dedicată (cum ar fi Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), cel mai probabil vei primii un videoclip gol doar cu audio.

Este o problemă legată de copyright (drepturi de autor). Acele aplicații pot împiedica utilizatorii de la înregistarea video, pentru a proteja conținutul lor."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "Dacă nu poți deschide înregistarea video cu niciun player video, înseamnă că înregistrarea ta este coruptă. Cel mai întalnit motiv care duce la o filmare coruptă este că sistemul Android a închis procesul de înregistrare.

În timpul înregistrării, procesul de înregistare rulează în background și are o prioritate scăzută față de alte aplicații.

Înregistarea ecranului este o sarcină foarte dificilă ce consumă o parte mare din resurse. Prin urmare, uneori, sistemul tău trebuie să închidă procesul de înregistare pentru a salva memorie, baterie și alte resurse pentru aplicațiile cu prioritate mai mare.

Recomandăm să scazi rezoluția, bitrate-ul și lungimea videoclipului pentru o stabilitate mai mare."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "Se pare că este o problemă a ROM-ului tău. Cumva înregistarea ecranului nu este suportată.

Te rog deschide Setările - Encoder și activează Rezolvare Ecran Verde. Ar trebuii să încerci să înregistrezi cu alte rezoluții.

Dacă încă ai această problemă, contactează-ne la az.screen.recorder@gmail.com pentru ajutor."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "Se pare că este o problemă a WhatsApp-ului cu compresia video. WhatsApp compresează înregistrările înainte de a fi trimise. Acest proces poate distruge unele filmări. Dacă poți încărca videoclipurile pe YouTube, Facebook fără probleme, asta înseamnă că înregistrările sunt în regulă.

Ar trebuii să contactezi asistența WhatsApp pentru a raporta problema de compresare."

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "On Android 5.1, you will get System UI Crash if you select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog.

It is a problem of Android 5.1. Therefore the only way to solve it is reinstall AZ Screen Recorder and remember to not select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Incompatible resolution maybe cause bug like that, so we recommend you to reduce resolution for better recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converting video to GIF with too many frames or too high quality may cause crash.

For control total frames, please select a combination of FPS and length, which gives less than 150 frames.

We recommend to select normal quality (less than 7) and 0.5 scale size."

"crashes_errors_question_4" : "Why did I get crash while converting video to GIF?"

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Yes, if you bought premium version, you can use it on all Android 5.0+ devices.

To use premium version on a new device, please open Settings of device - Accounts and sign in with the Google Account that was used for purchase. Then go to Google Play Store and install AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Here is the procedure of getting premium version back: 

STEP 1. Please open Settings of your device and make sure that you signed in with the main Google Account, which was used for purchase. If you did not, please sign in and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. 

STEP 2. If first step doesn't help, please check: How many Google Accounts are there in Settings of your device? If there is only one, please clear data of Google Play Store and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. If there are several Accounts, please remove all of them except the main Account. Then reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. When you get premium verison back, you can add the removed Accounts back. 

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "We apply 3 days refund policy. If you are still in the 3 days trial period and you want a refund, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Remember to give us your order details including order ID and purchase time."
"donate_upgrade_question_1" : "Can I use premium version on different devices?"
"donate_upgrade_question_2" : "I lost premium version. How can I get it back?"

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "If you are using Android 4.4 or lower, you cannot download AZ Screen Recorder. Our app is only available for devices running Android 5.0 or higher.

If you are using Android 5.0+, maybe your device is in our blacklist. Your device has many problems with screen recording, so we temporarily remove it from list of supported devices.

If you still want to try AZ Screen Recorder, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "If you enabled Show touches in AZ Screen Recorder, it will work after opening app and stop working after exit app. 

We consider that app is exited if user clicks the EXIT (4th) button of the floating control bar. 

In case AZ Screen Recorder is not exited normally and the Show touches continues working, you can disable it by going to Developer Options in Settings of your phone"

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "On some Xiaomi, Meizu… devices POP-UP WINDOW is disabled by default. Therefore the floating control bar of AZ Screen Recorder cannot be shown.

Please open AppInfo of AZ Screen Recorder and grant the POP-UP WINDOW (Alert) permisson>"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Please open Settings - Video Configuration - Orientation. If you plan to record games or other apps with landscape screen, please set Video orientation to Landscape.

If you select Auto orientation, the orientation of recorded video will depend on screen orientation at the moment of start recording."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google doesn't provide API for recording internal audio on Android 5.0 or higher. Therefore currently AZ Screen Recorder only supports recording sound via microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google doesn't allow to access microphone in parallel. That means the Video call app and AZ Screen Recorder can not record sound at same time."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "If you try to record a movie of an entertainment app (like Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), you might get a blank video with audio only.

It is the copy right issue.These apps can prevent users from screen recording to protect their content."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "If you cannot open recorded video with any media player, that means recorded video is corrupted. The most common reason is system killed the record-service.

While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "It seems to be a problem of your ROM. Somehow the screencast feature doesn't work.

Please open Settings - Encoder and enable Fix green screen mode. You also should try to record with different resolutions.

If you still get this problem, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com for support."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "It seems to be a problem of WhatsApp's video compression. WhatsApp compresses videos before sharing them. This process ruins some videos. If you can upload videos to Youtube, Facebook without problems, that means the recorded videos are fine.

You should contact WhatsApp to report the problem of video compression."
"video_audio_question_2" : "Why cannot I record system audio (internal sound, game sound)?"
"video_audio_question_3" : "Why is there no sound (audio) when I record a video call?"
"video_audio_question_4" : "Why did I get blank videos with only audio when I record films?"
"video_audio_question_6" : "Why do I always get videos with green screen?"
"video_audio_question_7" : "Why are some videos ruined after sharing via WhatsApp?"

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Yes, if you bought premium version, you can use it on all Android 5.0+ devices.

To use premium version on a new device, please open Settings of device - Accounts and sign in with the Google Account that was used for purchase. Then go to Google Play Store and install AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Here is the procedure of getting premium version back: 

STEP 1. Please open Settings of your device and make sure that you signed in with the main Google Account, which was used for purchase. If you did not, please sign in and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. 

STEP 2. If first step doesn't help, please check: How many Google Accounts are there in Settings of your device? If there is only one, please clear data of Google Play Store and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. If there are several Accounts, please remove all of them except the main Account. Then reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. When you get premium verison back, you can add the removed Accounts back. 

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "We apply 3 days refund policy. If you are still in the 3 days trial period and you want a refund, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Remember to give us your order details including order ID and purchase time."

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Please open Settings - Video Configuration - Orientation. If you plan to record games or other apps with landscape screen, please set Video orientation to Landscape.

If you select Auto orientation, the orientation of recorded video will depend on screen orientation at the moment of start recording."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google doesn't provide API for recording internal audio on Android 5.0 or higher. Therefore currently AZ Screen Recorder only supports recording sound vía microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google doesn't allow to access microphone in parallel. That means the Video call app and AZ Screen Recorder can not record sound at same time."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "If you try to record a movie of an entertainment app (like Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), you might get a blank video with audio only.

It is the copy right issue.These apps can prevent users from screen recording to protect their content."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "If you cannot open recorded video with any media player, that means recorded video is corrupted. The most common reason is system killed the record-service.

While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "It seems to be a problem of your ROM. Somehow the screencast feature doesn't work.

Please open Settings - Encoder and enable Fix green screen mode. You also should try to record with different resolutions.

If you still get this problem, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com for support."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "It seems to be a problem of WhatsApp's video compression. WhatsApp compresses videos before sharing them. This process ruins some videos. If you can upload videos to Youtube, Facebook without problems, that means the recorded videos are fine.

You should contact WhatsApp to report the problem of video compression."

"video_audio_question_7" : "Why are some videos ruined after sharing vía WhatsApp?"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "Con Android 5.1, si ottiene System UI Crash quando si seleziona Non visualizzare di nuovo nella finestra di dialogo permessi.

Questo è un problema di Android 5.1. l'unico modo per risolverlo è reinstallare AZ Screen Recorder e ricordarsi di non selezionare Non visualizzare di nuovo nella finestra di dialogo permessi."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Verificare il tipo di encoder selezionato. L'encoder predefinito potrebbe non funzionare su alcuni dispositivi. In questo caso selezionare l'Encoder avanzato."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "Durante la registrazione il servizio per la registrazione funziona in background ed ha una priorità minore rispetto alle altre applicazioni in esecuzione.

La registrazione dello schermo è un processo molto pesante e richiede molte risorse. A volte capita che il sistema termina il servizio di registrazione per risparmiare la memoria utilizzata, la batteria o per altre risorse, privilegiando le applicazione con priorità più alta.

Si raccomanda di ridurre la risoluzione, il bitrate e la lunghezza del video per ottenere una registrazione più stabile."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Convertire i video in GIF con molti frames (fotogrammi) o in alta qualità può causare crash.

Per controllare i frames totali, selezionare una combinazione di FPS e lunghezza che dia meno di 150 frames (fotogrammi).

Si raccomada di selezionare qualità normale (inferiore a 7) e scala 0.5."

"crashes_errors_question_4" : "Perché l'applicazione è andata in crash durante la conversione del video in GIF?"

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Si, se hai acquistato la versione premium la puoi utilizzare su tutti i dispositivi con Android 5.0 o superiori.

Per utilizzare la versione premium in un nuovo dispositivo, aprire Impostazioni del dispositivo - Accounts e accedere con l'account Google utilizzato per l'acquisto dell'applicazione. Poi apri il Play Store di Google e installa AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Questa la procedura per ottenere di nuovo la versione premium: 

PASSO 1. Apri il menù Impostazioni del tuo dispositivo e assicurati di essere autenticato con l'account Google che hai utilizzato per l'acquisto dell'applicazione. Se non lo hai già fatto, accedi come detto precedentemente e reinstalla AZ Screen Recorder. 

PASSO 2. Se la procedura riportata nel passo 1 non funziona, verificare quanti account Google sono impostati nel dispositivo. Se c'è un solo account, cancella i dati del Play Store Google e reinstalla AZ Screen Recorder. Se è presente più di un account, rimuovili tutti tranne quello principale (N.d.T. quello con in quale è stata acquistata l'applicazione) e poi reinstalla AZ Screen Recorder. Una volta ottenuta la versione premium è possibile aggiungere di nuovo gli accounts rimossi. 

PASSO 3. Se i passi 1 e 2 non funzionano, contattaci all'indirizzo az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "Applichiamo la politica del rimbosro entro 3 giorni. Se sei ancora nel periodo di prova di 3 giorni e vuoi ottenere il rimboroso, invia una mail all'indirizzo az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Ricorda di inviarci i dettagli dell'ordine, incluso l'ID dell'ordine e la data di acquisto."

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "Se si utilizza Android 4.4 o precedenti non è possibile scaricare AZ Screen Recorder. Questa applicazione è disponibile solo per dispositivi che utilizzano Android 5.0 o superiori.

Se stai utilizzando Android 5.0+, forse il tuo dispositivo è nella nostra blacklist. Ciò significa che il tuo dispositivo ha tanti problemi con la registrazione dello schermo, pertanto, lo abbiamo rimosso temporaneamente dalla lista dei dispositivi supportati.

Se vuoi provare AZ Screen Recorder, inviaci una mail all'indirizzo az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "Se hai abilitato Mostra tocchi in AZ Screen Recorder, questa funzionerà dopo l'apertura dell'applicazione e terminerà all'uscita. 

Consideriamo che l'applicazione sia terminata se l'utente clicca sul pulsante ESCI (4° pulsante) della barra fluttuante. 

Nel caso che AZ Screen Recorder sia stato chiuso normalmente e la funzione Mostra tocchi sia ancora in esecuzione, è possibile disabilitarla attraverso Opzioni sviluppatori dal menu Impostazioni del tuo dispositivo"

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "Su alcuni dispositivi Xiaomi e Meizu… la funzione MOSTRA NOTIFICHE è disabilitata in modo predefinito, pertanto la barra dei controlli fluttuante di AZ Screen Recorder non può essere visualizzata.

Aprire AppInfo (N.d.T. dal menù Applicazioni del dispositivo), selezionare AZ Screen Recorder e abilitare la funzione MOSTRA NOTIFICHE"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Apri Impostazioni - Configurazione video - Orientamento. Se si prevede di registrare giochi o altre applicazioni in modalità orizzontale, impostare l'orientamento del video in orizzontale.

Se si seleziona Orientamento automatico, l'orientamento del video registrato dipenderà dall'orientamento dello schermo al momento dell'inizio della registrazione."

"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google non fornisce le API per la registrazione dell'audio interno per Android 5.0 o successivi. Pertanto, AZ Screen Recorder, attualmente supporta solo la registrazione dell'audio emesso dal microfono."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google non permette l'accesso al microfono in parallelo. Questo significa che l'applicazione Video e AZ Screen Recorder non possono registrare un suono contemporaneamente."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "Se si tenta di registrare un filmato da un applicazione per intrattenimento (come Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), si potrebbe avere un video bianco con solo audio.

Si tratta di un problema di copyright. Questo tipo di applicazioni potrebbero impedire agli utenti la registrazione dello schermo per proteggere il loro contenuto."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "Se non è possibile aprire un video registrato con qualsiasi lettore multimediale, significa che il video è danneggiato. Uno dei motivi principali è che il sistema ha teminato il servizio di registrazione.

Durante la registrazione il servizio per la registrazione funziona in background ed ha una priorità minore rispetto alle altre applicazioni in esecuzione.

La registrazione dello schermo è un processo molto pesante e richiede molte risorse. A volte capita che il sistema termina il servizio di registrazione per risparmiare la memoria utilizzata, la batteria o per altre risorse, privilegiando le applicazione con priorità più alta.

Si raccomanda di ridurre la risoluzione, il bitrate e la lunghezza del video per ottenere una registrazione più stabile."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "Sembra essere un problema della ROM in esecuzione sul terminale. In qualche modo la funzione di screencast non funziona.

Si consiglia di contattare lo sviluppatore e segnalare questo problema."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "Sembra essere un problema della compressione video di WhatsApp. WhatsApp comprime i video prima di condividerli. Questo processo danneggia alcuni video. Se è possibile caricare i video su Youtube o Facebook senza problemi, significa che le registrazioni non sono danneggiate.

Si consiglia di contattare WhatsApp per segnalare il problema della compressione video."

"video_audio_question_7" : "Perché alcuni video si sono rovinati dopo averli condiviso tramite WhatsApp?"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "No Android 5.1, um erro na Interface do Sistema pode ocorrer se você selecionar Não exibir novamente na caixa de diálogo de permissão para capturar a tela.

Esse é um problema do Android 5.1. Entretanto esse problema pode ser resolvido se você reinstalar o AZ Screen Recorder e lembre-se de Não selecionar Não exibir novamente na caixa de diálogo de permissão de gravar a tela."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Pode ser que a resolução de gravação seja incompatível com a do aparelho, então recomendamos que mude a resolução para obter uma gravação melhor."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "Enquanto está gravando, o serviço de gravação roda em segundo plano e tem a prioridade de execução mais baixa que outros aplicativos que rodam em primeiro plano.

Gravar a tela é uma tarefa pesada, que exige muitos recursos. Assim sendo, às vezes, seu sistema operacional pode encerrar o serviço de gravação para liberar memória RAM, economizar bateria e outros recursos para serem usados por apps de maior prioridade.
Recomendamos reduzir a resolução, bit-rate e duração do vídeo para uma gravação mais estável."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converter um vídeo para GIF com muitos quadros (frames) ou com qualidade muito alta pode causar problemas.

Para controle total dos quadros, defina a combinação de FPS e duração para menos de 150 quadros.

Recomendamos que se defina uma qualidade normal (menor que 7) e uma escala de 0.5."

"crashes_errors_question_4" : "Por quê ocorrem falhas durante a conversão de um vídeo para GIF?"

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Sim, se você adquiriu a versão paga é possível usar em todos aparelhos Android 5.0 ou superior.

Para usar a versão paga no seu novo dispositivo, abra a guia Configurações em seu dispositivo - Contas e faça login com a Conta Google usada no momento da compra. Daí acesse a Google Play Store e instale o AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Siga o procedimento abaixo para conseguir acesso à versão que você pagou: 

1º PASSO. Abra a guia Configurações do seu dispositivo e certifique-se de que a conta principal do dispositivo seja a conta Google usada no momento da compra. Se não for, por favor faça login nessa conta e reinstale o AZ Screen Recorder. 

2º PASSO.Se o primeiro passo não adiantou, por favor verifique as seguintes opções: Quantas contas do Google estão configuradas no seu dispositivo? Se a sua conta for a única, limpe os dados da Google Play Store e reinstale o AZ Screen Recorder. Se houver outras contas no seu aparelho, por favor remova as contas, exceto a sua. Então reinstale o AZ Screen Recorder. Quando conseguir acessar novamente a versão paga, você está livre para adicionar novamente as outras contas que estavam no seu dispositivo. 

3º PASSO.Se os passos acima não resolveram seu problema, contate-nos pelo e-mail az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "Nossa política não permite reembolsos após 3 dias. Se, nesses 3 dias você quiser ser reembolsado(a), por favor contate-nos pelo e-mail az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Lembre-se de enviar-nos também os detalhes da compra, o que inclui o ID e horário da compra."

"donate_upgrade_question_2" : "Perdi o acesso à versão paga. Como posso recuperar esse acesso?"

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "Se você usa o Android 4.4 ou inferior, você não pode baixar o AZ Screen Recorder. Nosso aplicativo está disponível apenas para aparelhos que rodam o Android 5.0 ou superior.

Se você usa o Android 5.0 ou superior talvez seu aparelho esteja fora da lista de aparelhos suportados. Quando um aparelho apresenta problemas com a gravação de tela nós o removemos da lista de aparelhos suportados.

Se mesmo assim você quer utilizar o AZ Screen Recorder nos contate pelo e-mail az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "Se você ativou a opção Exibir toques no AZ Screen Recorder, isso irá funcionar apenas após o aplicativo abrir e deixará de funcionar após o aplicativo ser fechado. 

Nós consideramos que o app foi encerrado totalmente se o usuário clicar no botão SAIR (4º) no controlador flutuante. 

Caso o AZ Screen Recorder não feche de maneira correta e Exibir toques continuar a aparecer, você pode desativar essa opção por acessar a opção de Desenvolvedores na seção de Configurações do seu dispositivo"

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "OEm alguns dispositivos Xiaomi, Meizu… a opção JANELA DE POP-UP está desativada por padrão. Por isso o controlador flutuante do AZ Screen Recorder não aparecerá.

Abra a tela de informações do AZ Screen Recorder e conceda a permissão de alerta em POP-UP"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Por favor abra  Configurações - Configuração de Vídeo - Orientação. Se você está planejando gravar jogos ou outras apps com a tela em modo paisagem, por favor  defina a Orientação de Vídeo para Paisagem.

Se você definir Automático, a oreintação do vídeo gravado vai estar de acordo com a oreintação da tela  no momento do início da gravação."

"video_audio_answer_2" : "A Google não fornece nenhuma API para gravar áudios internos para o Android 5.0 em diante. Assim sendo, atualmente o AZ Screen Recorder suporta somente gravações a parir do microfone do dispositivo."

"video_audio_answer_3" : "A Google não permite que o microfone seja acessado de forma paralela. Isso significa que o AZ Screen Recorder não pode gravar ao mesmo tempo que um aplicativo de chamada de vídeo esteja funcionando."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "Se você tentar gravar um filme a partir de um app de entretenimento (Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…),  o vídeo pode ficar branco tocando apenas o áudio. .

Isso acontece por causa dos Direitos Autorais. Esses apps impedem que seus usuários gravem a tela a fim de proteger todo o seu conteúdo."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "Se não estiver conseguindo abrir em nenhum reprodutor de vídeo o vídeo que você gravou, isso significa que o vídeo está ou foi corrompido. O motivo mais comum é que o sistema pode ter fechado o serviço de gravação.

Enquanto a gravação está rodando, o serviço de gravação está rodando em segundo plano e possui baixa prioridade de execução em relação a outros aplicativos, que rodam em primeiro plano.

Gravar a tela envolve uma série de recursos pesados. Por isso, às vezes, o sistema operacional pode encerrar o serviço de gravação a fim de economizar memória, bateria e outros recursos para os aplicativos de maior prioridade.

Nós recomendamos reduzir a resolução, bit-rate e duração do vídeo para se ter uma gravação mais estável."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "Parace um problema com a ROM do seu telefone. Por algum motivo o serviço de Screencast não está funcionando.

Por favor abra Configurações - Encoder e ative a opção Corrigir tela verde. Você pode tentar gravar em diferentes resoluções.

Se o problema persistir, contate-nos através do e-mail az.screen.recorder@gmail.com para obter ajuda."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "Este é um problema com a compressão de vídeo do WhatsApp. O WhatsApp comprime os vídeos antes de enviá-los. Esse processo faz com que a qualidade seja afetada. Se você fizer upload desses vídeos para o YouTube ou Facebook sem perder a qualidade, isso significa que os vídeos gravados estão em ótima qualidade.

Você deve reportar ao WhatsApp caso esse problema aconteça contigo e mencionar que está tendo problemas ao compartilhar vídeos."
"video_audio_question_1" : "Por quê os vídeos gravados estão pequenos??"
"video_audio_question_2" : "Por quê não consigo grvar áudios do sistema (sons internos ou de jogos, etc)?"

"video_audio_question_6" : "Por quê os videos que gravei estão com a tela verde?"
"video_audio_question_7" : "Por quê alguns vídeos perdem a qualidade quando os envio pelo WhatsApp?"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "On Android 5.1, you will get System UI Crash if you select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog.

It is a problem of Android 5.1. Therefore the only way to solve it is reinstall AZ Screen Recorder and remember to not select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Incompatible resolution maybe cause bug like that, so we recommend you to reduce resolution for better recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converting video to GIF with too many frames or too high quality may cause crash.

For control total frames, please select a combination of FPS and length, which gives less than 150 frames.

We recommend to select normal quality (less than 7) and 0.5 scale size."

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Yes, if you bought premium version, you can use it on all Android 5.0+ devices.

To use premium version on a new device, please open Settings of device - Accounts and sign in with the Google Account that was used for purchase. Then go to Google Play Store and install AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Here is the procedure of getting premium version back: 

STEP 1. Please open Settings of your device and make sure that you signed in with the main Google Account, which was used for purchase. If you did not, please sign in and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. 

STEP 2. If first step doesn't help, please check: How many Google Accounts are there in Settings of your device? If there is only one, please clear data of Google Play Store and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. If there are several Accounts, please remove all of them except the main Account. Then reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. When you get premium verison back, you can add the removed Accounts back. 

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "We apply 3 days refund policy. If you are still in the 3 days trial period and you want a refund, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Remember to give us your order details including order ID and purchase time."

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "If you are using Android 4.4 or lower, you cannot download AZ Screen Recorder. Our app is only available for devices running Android 5.0 or higher.

If you are using Android 5.0+, maybe your device is in our blacklist. Your device has many problems with screen recording, so we temporarily remove it from list of supported devices.

If you still want to try AZ Screen Recorder, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "If you enabled Show touches in AZ Screen Recorder, it will work after opening app and stop working after exit app. 

We consider that app is exited if user clicks the EXIT (4th) button of the floating control bar. 

In case AZ Screen Recorder is not exited normally and the Show touches continues working, you can disable it by going to Developer Options in Settings of your phone"

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "On some Xiaomi, Meizu… devices POP-UP WINDOW is disabled by default. Therefore the floating control bar of AZ Screen Recorder cannot be shown.

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Please open Settings - Video Configuration - Orientation. If you plan to record games or other apps with landscape screen, please set Video orientation to Landscape.

If you select Auto orientation, the orientation of recorded video will depend on screen orientation at the moment of start recording."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google doesn't provide API for recording internal audio on Android 5.0 or higher. Therefore currently AZ Screen Recorder only supports recording sound via microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google doesn't allow to access microphone in parallel. That means the Video call app and AZ Screen Recorder can not record sound at same time."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "If you try to record a movie of an entertainment app (like Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), you might get a blank video with audio only.

It is the copy right issue.These apps can prevent users from screen recording to protect their content."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "If you cannot open recorded video with any media player, that means recorded video is corrupted. The most common reason is system killed the record-service.

While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "It seems to be a problem of your ROM. Somehow the screencast feature doesn't work.

Please open Settings - Encoder and enable Fix green screen mode. You also should try to record with different resolutions.

If you still get this problem, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com for support."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "It seems to be a problem of WhatsApp's video compression. WhatsApp compresses videos before sharing them. This process ruins some videos. If you can upload videos to Youtube, Facebook without problems, that means the recorded videos are fine.

You should contact WhatsApp to report the problem of video compression."

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "If you are using Android 4.4 or lower, you cannot download AZ Screen Recorder. Our app is only available for devices running Android 5.0 or higher.

If you are using Android 5.0+, maybe your device is in our blacklist. Your device has many problems with screen recording, so we temporarily remove it from list of supported devices.

If you still want to try AZ Screen Recorder, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "If you enabled Show touches in AZ Screen Recorder, it will work after opening app and stop working after exit app. 

We consider that app is exited if user clicks the EXIT (4th) button of the floating control bar. 

In case AZ Screen Recorder is not exited normally and the Show touches continues working, you can disable it by going to Developer Options in Settings of your phone"

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "On some Xiaomi, Meizu… devices POP-UP WINDOW is disabled by default. Therefore the floating control bar of AZ Screen Recorder cannot be shown.

Please open AppInfo of AZ Screen Recorder and grant the POP-UP WINDOW (Alert) permisson>"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Please open Settings - Video Configuration - Orientation. If you plan to record games or other apps with landscape screen, please set Video orientation to Landscape.

If you select Auto orientation, the orientation of recorded video will depend on screen orientation at the moment of start recording."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google doesn't provide API for recording internal audio on Android 5.0 or higher. Therefore currently AZ Screen Recorder only supports recording sound via microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google doesn't allow to access microphone in parallel. That means the Video call app and AZ Screen Recorder can not record sound at same time."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "If you try to record a movie of an entertainment app (like Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), you might get a blank video with audio only.

It is the copy right issue.These apps can prevent users from screen recording to protect their content."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "If you cannot open recorded video with any media player, that means recorded video is corrupted. The most common reason is system killed the record-service.

While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "It seems to be a problem of your ROM. Somehow the screencast feature doesn't work.

Please open Settings - Encoder and enable Fix green screen mode. You also should try to record with different resolutions.

If you still get this problem, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com for support."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "It seems to be a problem of WhatsApp's video compression. WhatsApp compresses videos before sharing them. This process ruins some videos. If you can upload videos to Youtube, Facebook without problems, that means the recorded videos are fine.

You should contact WhatsApp to report the problem of video compression."

"video_audio_question_6" : "Why do I always get videos with green screen?"
"video_audio_question_7" : "Why are some videos ruined after sharing via WhatsApp?"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "On Android 5.1, you will get System UI Crash if you select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog.

It is a problem of Android 5.1. Therefore the only way to solve it is reinstall AZ Screen Recorder and remember to not select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Incompatible resolution maybe cause bug like that, so we recommend you to reduce resolution for better recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converting video to GIF with too many frames or too high quality may cause crash.

For control total frames, please select a combination of FPS and length, which gives less than 150 frames.

We recommend to select normal quality (less than 7) and 0.5 scale size."

"crashes_errors_question_2" : "Why does app crash immediately after start recording?"
"crashes_errors_question_4" : "Why did I get crash while converting video to GIF?"

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Yes, if you bought premium version, you can use it on all Android 5.0+ devices.

To use premium version on a new device, please open Settings of device - Accounts and sign in with the Google Account that was used for purchase. Then go to Google Play Store and install AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Here is the procedure of getting premium version back: 

STEP 1. Please open Settings of your device and make sure that you signed in with the main Google Account, which was used for purchase. If you did not, please sign in and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. 

STEP 2. If first step doesn't help, please check: How many Google Accounts are there in Settings of your device? If there is only one, please clear data of Google Play Store and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. If there are several Accounts, please remove all of them except the main Account. Then reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. When you get premium verison back, you can add the removed Accounts back. 

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "We apply 3 days refund policy. If you are still in the 3 days trial period and you want a refund, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Remember to give us your order details including order ID and purchase time."
"donate_upgrade_question_1" : "Can I use premium version on different devices?"
"donate_upgrade_question_2" : "I lost premium version. How can I get it back?"

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "If you are using Android 4.4 or lower, you cannot download AZ Screen Recorder. Our app is only available for devices running Android 5.0 or higher.

If you are using Android 5.0+, maybe your device is in our blacklist. Your device has many problems with screen recording, so we temporarily remove it from list of supported devices.

If you still want to try AZ Screen Recorder, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "If you enabled Show touches in AZ Screen Recorder, it will work after opening app and stop working after exit app. 

We consider that app is exited if user clicks the EXIT (4th) button of the floating control bar. 

In case AZ Screen Recorder is not exited normally and the Show touches continues working, you can disable it by going to Developer Options in Settings of your phone"

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "On some Xiaomi, Meizu… devices POP-UP WINDOW is disabled by default. Therefore the floating control bar of AZ Screen Recorder cannot be shown.

Please open AppInfo of AZ Screen Recorder and grant the POP-UP WINDOW (Alert) permisson>"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Please open Settings - Video Configuration - Orientation. If you plan to record games or other apps with landscape screen, please set Video orientation to Landscape.

If you select Auto orientation, the orientation of recorded video will depend on screen orientation at the moment of start recording."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google doesn't provide API for recording internal audio on Android 5.0 or higher. Therefore currently AZ Screen Recorder only supports recording sound via microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google doesn't allow to access microphone in parallel. That means the Video call app and AZ Screen Recorder can not record sound at same time."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "If you try to record a movie of an entertainment app (like Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), you might get a blank video with audio only.

It is the copy right issue.These apps can prevent users from screen recording to protect their content."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "If you cannot open recorded video with any media player, that means recorded video is corrupted. The most common reason is system killed the record-service.

While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "It seems to be a problem of your ROM. Somehow the screencast feature doesn't work.

Please open Settings - Encoder and enable Fix green screen mode. You also should try to record with different resolutions.

If you still get this problem, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com for support."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "It seems to be a problem of WhatsApp's video compression. WhatsApp compresses videos before sharing them. This process ruins some videos. If you can upload videos to Youtube, Facebook without problems, that means the recorded videos are fine.

You should contact WhatsApp to report the problem of video compression."

"video_audio_question_6" : "Why do I always get videos with green screen?"
"video_audio_question_7" : "Why are some videos ruined after sharing via WhatsApp?"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "On Android 5.1, you will get System UI Crash if you select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog.

It is a problem of Android 5.1. Therefore the only way to solve it is reinstall AZ Screen Recorder and remember to not select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Incompatible resolution maybe cause bug like that, so we recommend you to reduce resolution for better recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converting video to GIF with too many frames or too high quality may cause crash.

For control total frames, please select a combination of FPS and length, which gives less than 150 frames.

We recommend to select normal quality (less than 7) and 0.5 scale size."

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "If you are using Android 4.4 or lower, you cannot download AZ Screen Recorder. Our app is only available for devices running Android 5.0 or higher.

If you are using Android 5.0+, maybe your device is in our blacklist. Your device has many problems with screen recording, so we temporarily remove it from list of supported devices.

If you still want to try AZ Screen Recorder, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "If you enabled Show touches in AZ Screen Recorder, it will work after opening app and stop working after exit app. 

We consider that app is exited if user clicks the EXIT (4th) button of the floating control bar. 

In case AZ Screen Recorder is not exited normally and the Show touches continues working, you can disable it by going to Developer Options in Settings of your phone"

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "On some Xiaomi, Meizu… devices POP-UP WINDOW is disabled by default. Therefore the floating control bar of AZ Screen Recorder cannot be shown.

Please open AppInfo of AZ Screen Recorder and grant the POP-UP WINDOW (Alert) permisson>"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Please open Settings - Video Configuration - Orientation. If you plan to record games or other apps with landscape screen, please set Video orientation to Landscape.

If you select Auto orientation, the orientation of recorded video will depend on screen orientation at the moment of start recording."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google doesn't provide API for recording internal audio on Android 5.0 or higher. Therefore currently AZ Screen Recorder only supports recording sound via microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google doesn't allow to access microphone in parallel. That means the Video call app and AZ Screen Recorder can not record sound at same time."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "If you try to record a movie of an entertainment app (like Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), you might get a blank video with audio only.

It is the copy right issue.These apps can prevent users from screen recording to protect their content."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "If you cannot open recorded video with any media player, that means recorded video is corrupted. The most common reason is system killed the record-service.

While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "It seems to be a problem of your ROM. Somehow the screencast feature doesn't work.

Please open Settings - Encoder and enable Fix green screen mode. You also should try to record with different resolutions.

If you still get this problem, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com for support."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "It seems to be a problem of WhatsApp's video compression. WhatsApp compresses videos before sharing them. This process ruins some videos. If you can upload videos to Youtube, Facebook without problems, that means the recorded videos are fine.

You should contact WhatsApp to report the problem of video compression."
"video_audio_question_2" : "Why cannot I record system audio (internal sound, game sound)?"
"video_audio_question_3" : "Why is there no sound (audio) when I record a video call?"
"video_audio_question_4" : "Why did I get blank videos with only audio when I record films?"
"video_audio_question_6" : "Why do I always get videos with green screen?"
"video_audio_question_7" : "Why are some videos ruined after sharing via WhatsApp?"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "On Android 5.1, you will get System UI Crash if you select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog.

It is a problem of Android 5.1. Therefore the only way to solve it is reinstall AZ Screen Recorder and remember to not select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Incompatible resolution maybe cause bug like that, so we recommend you to reduce resolution for better recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converting video to GIF with too many frames or too high quality may cause crash.

For control total frames, please select a combination of FPS and length, which gives less than 150 frames.

We recommend to select normal quality (less than 7) and 0.5 scale size."

"crashes_errors_question_2" : "Why does app crash immediately after start recording?"
"crashes_errors_question_4" : "Why did I get crash while converting video to GIF?"

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Yes, if you bought premium version, you can use it on all Android 5.0+ devices.

To use premium version on a new device, please open Settings of device - Accounts and sign in with the Google Account that was used for purchase. Then go to Google Play Store and install AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Here is the procedure of getting premium version back: 

STEP 1. Please open Settings of your device and make sure that you signed in with the main Google Account, which was used for purchase. If you did not, please sign in and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. 

STEP 2. If first step doesn't help, please check: How many Google Accounts are there in Settings of your device? If there is only one, please clear data of Google Play Store and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. If there are several Accounts, please remove all of them except the main Account. Then reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. When you get premium verison back, you can add the removed Accounts back. 

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."
