"video_audio_answer_1" : "Please open Settings - Video Configuration - Orientation. If you plan to record games or other apps with landscape screen, please set Video orientation to Landscape.

If you select Auto orientation, the orientation of recorded video will depend on screen orientation at the moment of start recording."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google doesn't provide API for recording internal audio on Android 5.0 or higher. Therefore currently AZ Screen Recorder only supports recording sound via microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google doesn't allow to access microphone in parallel. That means the Video call app and AZ Screen Recorder can not record sound at same time."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "If you try to record a movie of an entertainment app (like Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), you might get a blank video with audio only.

It is the copy right issue.These apps can prevent users from screen recording to protect their content."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "If you cannot open recorded video with any media player, that means recorded video is corrupted. The most common reason is system killed the record-service.

While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "It seems to be a problem of your ROM. Somehow the screencast feature doesn't work.

Please open Settings - Encoder and enable Fix green screen mode. You also should try to record with different resolutions.

If you still get this problem, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com for support."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "It seems to be a problem of WhatsApp's video compression. WhatsApp compresses videos before sharing them. This process ruins some videos. If you can upload videos to Youtube, Facebook without problems, that means the recorded videos are fine.

You should contact WhatsApp to report the problem of video compression."

"video_audio_question_3" : "Why is there no sound (audio) when I record a video call?"
"video_audio_question_4" : "Why did I get blank videos with only audio when I record films?"
"video_audio_question_6" : "Why do I always get videos with green screen?"
"video_audio_question_7" : "Why are some videos ruined after sharing via WhatsApp?"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "On Android 5.1, you will get System UI Crash if you select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog.

It is a problem of Android 5.1. Therefore the only way to solve it is reinstall AZ Screen Recorder and remember to not select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converting video to GIF with too many frames or too high quality may cause crash.

For control total frames, please select a combination of FPS and length, which gives less than 150 frames.

We recommend to select normal quality (less than 7) and 0.5 scale size."

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Please open Settings - Video Configuration - Orientation. If you plan to record games or other apps with landscape screen, please set Video orientation to Landscape.

If you select Auto orientation, the orientation of recorded video will depend on screen orientation at the moment of start recording."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google doesn't provide API for recording internal audio on Android 5.0 or higher. Therefore currently AZ Screen Recorder only supports recording sound via microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google doesn't allow to access microphone in parallel. That means the Video call app and AZ Screen Recorder can not record sound at same time."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "If you try to record a movie of an entertainment app (like Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), you might get a blank video with audio only.

It is the copy right issue.These apps can prevent users from screen recording to protect their content."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "If you cannot open recorded video with any media player, that means recorded video is corrupted. The most common reason is system killed the record-service.

While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "It seems to be a problem of your ROM. Somehow the screencast feature doesn't work.

Please open Settings - Encoder and enable Fix green screen mode. You also should try to record with different resolutions.

If you still get this problem, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com for support."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "It seems to be a problem of WhatsApp's video compression. WhatsApp compresses videos before sharing them. This process ruins some videos. If you can upload videos to Youtube, Facebook without problems, that means the recorded videos are fine.

You should contact WhatsApp to report the problem of video compression."
"video_audio_question_2" : "Why cannot I record system audio (internal sound, game sound)?"
"video_audio_question_3" : "Why is there no sound (audio) when I record a video call?"
"video_audio_question_4" : "Why did I get blank videos with only audio when I record films?"
"video_audio_question_6" : "Why do I always get videos with green screen?"
"video_audio_question_7" : "Why are some videos ruined after sharing via WhatsApp?"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "On Android 5.1, you will get System UI Crash if you select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog.

It is a problem of Android 5.1. Therefore the only way to solve it is reinstall AZ Screen Recorder and remember to not select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Incompatible resolution maybe cause bug like that, so we recommend you to reduce resolution for better recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converting video to GIF with too many frames or too high quality may cause crash.

For control total frames, please select a combination of FPS and length, which gives less than 150 frames.

We recommend to select normal quality (less than 7) and 0.5 scale size."

"crashes_errors_question_2" : "Why does app crash immediately after start recording?"
"crashes_errors_question_4" : "Why did I get crash while converting video to GIF?"

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Yes, if you bought premium version, you can use it on all Android 5.0+ devices.

To use premium version on a new device, please open Settings of device - Accounts and sign in with the Google Account that was used for purchase. Then go to Google Play Store and install AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Here is the procedure of getting premium version back: 

STEP 1. Please open Settings of your device and make sure that you signed in with the main Google Account, which was used for purchase. If you did not, please sign in and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. 

STEP 2. If first step doesn't help, please check: How many Google Accounts are there in Settings of your device? If there is only one, please clear data of Google Play Store and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. If there are several Accounts, please remove all of them except the main Account. Then reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. When you get premium verison back, you can add the removed Accounts back. 

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "We apply 3 days refund policy. If you are still in the 3 days trial period and you want a refund, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Remember to give us your order details including order ID and purchase time."
"donate_upgrade_question_1" : "Can I use premium version on different devices?"
"donate_upgrade_question_2" : "I lost premium version. How can I get it back?"

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "If you are using Android 4.4 or lower, you cannot download AZ Screen Recorder. Our app is only available for devices running Android 5.0 or higher.

If you are using Android 5.0+, maybe your device is in our blacklist. Your device has many problems with screen recording, so we temporarily remove it from list of supported devices.

If you still want to try AZ Screen Recorder, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "If you enabled Show touches in AZ Screen Recorder, it will work after opening app and stop working after exit app. 

We consider that app is exited if user clicks the EXIT (4th) button of the floating control bar. 

In case AZ Screen Recorder is not exited normally and the Show touches continues working, you can disable it by going to Developer Options in Settings of your phone"

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "On some Xiaomi, Meizu… devices POP-UP WINDOW is disabled by default. Therefore the floating control bar of AZ Screen Recorder cannot be shown.

Please open AppInfo of AZ Screen Recorder and grant the POP-UP WINDOW (Alert) permisson>"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Please open Settings - Video Configuration - Orientation. If you plan to record games or other apps with landscape screen, please set Video orientation to Landscape.

If you select Auto orientation, the orientation of recorded video will depend on screen orientation at the moment of start recording."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google doesn't provide API for recording internal audio on Android 5.0 or higher. Therefore currently AZ Screen Recorder only supports recording sound via microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google doesn't allow to access microphone in parallel. That means the Video call app and AZ Screen Recorder can not record sound at same time."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "If you try to record a movie of an entertainment app (like Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), you might get a blank video with audio only.

It is the copy right issue.These apps can prevent users from screen recording to protect their content."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "If you cannot open recorded video with any media player, that means recorded video is corrupted. The most common reason is system killed the record-service.

While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "It seems to be a problem of your ROM. Somehow the screencast feature doesn't work.

Please open Settings - Encoder and enable Fix green screen mode. You also should try to record with different resolutions.

If you still get this problem, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com for support."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "It seems to be a problem of WhatsApp's video compression. WhatsApp compresses videos before sharing them. This process ruins some videos. If you can upload videos to Youtube, Facebook without problems, that means the recorded videos are fine.

You should contact WhatsApp to report the problem of video compression."
"video_audio_question_2" : "Why cannot I record system audio (internal sound, game sound)?"
"video_audio_question_3" : "Why is there no sound (audio) when I record a video call?"
"video_audio_question_4" : "Why did I get blank videos with only audio when I record films?"
"video_audio_question_6" : "Why do I always get videos with green screen?"
"video_audio_question_7" : "Why are some videos ruined after sharing via WhatsApp?"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "Käyttöliittymä kaatuu, jos valitset Älä näytä uudestaan valintaikkunassa. Kyseessä on virhe Android 5.1:ssä. Kaatumisen voi estää vain asentamalla AZ Screen Recorderin uudestaan, jonka lisäksi valintaikkunan esiintyessä ei saa valita Älä näytä uudestaan."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Tarkista valittu enkooderi. Oletusenkooderi ei välttämättä toimi kaikilla laitteilla. Kokeike tässä tapauksessa edistynyttä enkooderia."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "Tallennuksen aikana palvelu on päällä taustalla, joten sillä on pienempi prioriteetti kuin sovelluksilla, jotka ovat käynnissä etualalla.

Ruuduntallennus on raskas prosessi ja vaatii paljon resursseja. Tämän takia järjestelmäsi on joskus pakko sulkea tallennuspalvelu taustalta säästääkseen laitteen muistia, akkua ja muita resursseja korkeamman prioriteetin sovelluksille.

Suosittelemme pienentämään resoluutiota, tiedonsiirtonopeutta ja videon pituutta, jotta tallennusprosessi olisi vakaampi laitteellasi."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Videon muuntaminen GIF-kuvaksi liian monella kehyksellä tai liian korkealla laadulla voi aiheuttaa kaatumisen.

Kokeile valita FPS ja kesto siten, että kehyksiä kertyy vähemmän kuin 150.

Suosittelemme, että valitset normaalin laadun (pienempi kuin 7) sekä kuvan kooksi 0,5."
"crashes_errors_question_1" : "Miksi saan ilmoituksen Käyttöliittymä on pysähtynyt Android 5.1:ssä?"

Mene sitten Play-kauppaan ja asenna sovellus.Jos sinulla on ongelmia premiumin ostamisessa tai käyttämisessä, ota yhteyttä tukeen."

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Kyllä, jos ostit premium-version, voit käyttää sitä kaikilla laitteillasi, joissa on Android 5.0 tai sitä uudempi käyttöjärjestelmäversio.

Käyttääksesi premium-versiota uudella laitteella, avaa laitteestasi Asetukset – Tilit ja kirjaudu sisään sillä Google-tilillä, jolla ostit premiumin. Tämän jälkeen mene Google Play -kauppaan ja asenna AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Toimintaohjeet saadaksesi premium-version takaisin: 

VAIHE 1. Avaa laitteesi Asetukset ja varmista, että olet kirjautunut sillä Google-tilillä, jolla alun perin ostit premiumin. Jos et ole kirjautunut kyseisellä tilillä: kirjaudu ja asenna AZ Screen Recorder uudestaan. 

VAIHE 2. Jos ensimmäinen vaihe ei auttanut, tarkista, kuinka monta Google-tiliä laitteeseesi on kytkettynä. Jos vain yksi, tyhjennä Google Play -kaupan tiedot ja asenna AZ Screen Recorder uudelleen. Jos sinulla on useampia tilejä kytkettynä, poista niistä kaikki paitsi päätili, ja asenna sen jälkeen AZ Screen Recorder uudestaan. Kun huomaat saaneesi premium-version takaisin, voit lisätä poistamasi tilit takaisin. 

VAIHE 3. Jos kumpikaan yllä olevista vaiheista ei auttanut sinua, lähetäthän meille sähköpostia osoitteeseen az.screen.recorder@gmail.com, niin autamme sinua parhaamme mukaan."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "Tarjoamme 3 päivän takaisinmaksun. Jos et ole käyttänyt premiumia enempää kuin 3 päivää ja haluat rahasi takaisin, lähetäthän meille sähköpostin osoitteeseen az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Muista kirjoittaa viestiin ostotietosi, mukaan lukien tilausnumeron ja ostoajankohdan."

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "os käytät Android 4.4:ää tai vanhempaa versiota, AZ Screen Recorderia ei voi käynnistää. Sovelluksemme on satavilla vin Androi 5.0:lle ja sitä uudemmille versioille.

Jos käytät Android 5.0:aa (tai uudempaa), laitteesi saattaa olla tukemattomien laitteiden joukossa. Näillä laitteilla on erityisen paljon ongelmia ruuduntallennuksen kanssa, joten olemme väliaikaisesti poistaneet tuen niille kokonaan.

Jos haluat silti kokeilla AZ Screen Recorderia laitteellasi, lähetäthän meille sähköpostia osoitteeseen az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "Jos otit AZ Screen Recorderin asetuksista käyttöön kohdan Näytä kosketukset, se toimii kunnes olet poistunut sovelluksesta kokonaan. 

Poistuminen tarkoittaa sitä, että napautat leijuvasta apuikkunasta neljättä nappia. 

Jos et poistu AZ Screen Recorderista apuikkunan kautta, Näytä kosketukset jää päälle. Saat sen pois päältä menemällä kohtaan Asetukset – Kehittäjäasetukset – Näytä kosketukset. Saat avattua Kehittäjäasetukset menemällä Asetuksissa kohtaan Tietoja puhelimesta ja napauttamalla kohtaa Ohjelmistoversion numero 7 kertaa."

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "Joillakin Xiaomi- ja Meizu-laitteillaponnahdusikkuna on poissa päältä oletuksena. Tämän takia AZ Screen Recorderin leijuvaa apuikkunaa ei voida näyttää.

Avaa AZ Screen Recorderin tiedot sovellusasetuksista ja anna sovellukselle lupa näyttää ponnahdusikkunoita."
"other_faqs_question_1" : "Miksi AZ Screen Recorder ei ole yhteensopiva laitteeni kanssa?"
"other_faqs_question_2" : "Miksi Näytä kosketuksettoimii senkin jälkeen, kun olen sulkenut AZ Screen Recorderin?"
"other_faqs_question_3" : "Miksi en pysty avaamaan AZ Screen Recorderia Xiaomin tai Meizun laitteilla?"

"translators_msg" : "Jos luulet voivasi auttaa AZ Screen Recorderin lokalisoimisessa omalle kielellesi tai löydät käännöksestä virheen, otathan meihin yhteyttä."
"use_magic_button_summary_ticked" : "Napauta ruudun oikeaa yläreunaa kerran pysäyttääksesi/jatkaaksesi, tuplanapauta lopettaaksesi tai pidä pohjassa piirtääksesi"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Avaa Asetukset – Videoasetukset – Näytön asento. Jos haluat tallentaa videota peleistä tai muista sovelluksista, jotka ovat vaakasuunnassa, valitse Näytön suunnaksi Vaaka.

Jos valitset Automaattisen asennon, videon asento määrittyy sen asennon perusteella, joka vallitsee videon tallentamisen aloitushetkellä."

"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google ei tarjoa rajapintaa järjestelmän sisäisen äänen taltioimiselle Android 5.0:ssa ja sitä uudemmissa versioissa. Tämän takia AZ Screen Recorder tukee tällä hetkellä vain laitteen mikrofonin kautta tallennettua ääntä."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google ei salli mikrofonin käyttöä rinnakkaisesti. Tämä tarkoittaa sitä, että videopuhelusovellus ja AZ Screen Recorder eivät voi käyttää mikrofonia samaan aikaan."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "Jos yrität tallentaa sisältöä jostakin tilausvideopalvelusta (kuten Netflix, HBO Nordic, tai Viaplay), saattaa tallentamassasi videossa näkyä vain tyhjä ruutu.

Kyse on tekijänoikeuksien suojelemisesta. Nämä sovellukset voivat estää käyttäjiltä ruuduntallennuksen suojellakseen sisältöään."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "Jos et saa tallennettua videota auki millään mediatoistimella, on videosi vioittunut. Yleisin syy vioittumiseen on se, että järjestelmä on pysäyttänyt ruuduntallennuspalvelun kesken tallennuksen.

Tallennuksen aikana palvelu on päällä taustalla, joten sillä on pienempi prioriteetti kuin sovelluksilla, jotka ovat käynnissä etualalla.

Ruuduntallennus on raskas prosessi ja vaatii paljon resursseja. Tämän takia järjestelmäsi on joskus pakko sulkea tallennuspalvelu taustalta säästääkseen laitteen muistia, akkua ja muita resursseja korkeamman prioriteetin sovelluksille.

Suosittelemme pienentämään resoluutiota, tiedonsiirtonopeutta ja videon pituutta, jotta tallennusprosessi olisi vakaampi laitteellasi."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "IOngelma saattaa olla laiteohjelmistossasi. Ruudun projisointi ei jostakin syystä toimi.

Ota tarvittaessa yhteys laitteesi valmistajaan."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "Ongelma on WhatsAppin videopakkauksessa. WhatsApp pakkaa videot pienemmiksi ennen niiden jakamista. Tämä prosessi saattaa pilata osan videoista. Jos pystyt lataamaan tallentamasi videon esim. YouTubeen tai Facebookiin ongelmitta, on videosi todennäköisesti kunnossa.

Ota tarvittaessa yhteys WhatsAppin tukeen, jos videoissasi ilmenee erityisen huonoa laatua."

"video_audio_question_7" : "Miksi jotkin videot menevät pilalle, kun yritän jakaa niitä WhatsAppissä?"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "On Android 5.1, you will get System UI Crash if you select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog.

It is a problem of Android 5.1. Therefore the only way to solve it is reinstall AZ Screen Recorder and remember to not select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Incompatible resolution maybe cause bug like that, so we recommend you to reduce resolution for better recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converting video to GIF with too many frames or too high quality may cause crash.

For control total frames, please select a combination of FPS and length, which gives less than 150 frames.

We recommend to select normal quality (less than 7) and 0.5 scale size."

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Yes, if you bought premium version, you can use it on all Android 5.0+ devices.

To use premium version on a new device, please open Settings of device - Accounts and sign in with the Google Account that was used for purchase. Then go to Google Play Store and install AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Here is the procedure of getting premium version back: 

STEP 1. Please open Settings of your device and make sure that you signed in with the main Google Account, which was used for purchase. If you did not, please sign in and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. 

STEP 2. If first step doesn't help, please check: How many Google Accounts are there in Settings of your device? If there is only one, please clear data of Google Play Store and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. If there are several Accounts, please remove all of them except the main Account. Then reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. When you get premium verison back, you can add the removed Accounts back. 

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "We apply 3 days refund policy. If you are still in the 3 days trial period and you want a refund, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Remember to give us your order details including order ID and purchase time."
"donate_upgrade_question_1" : "Can I use premium version on different devices?"
"donate_upgrade_question_2" : "I lost premium version. How can I get it back?"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Please open Settings - Video Configuration - Orientation. If you plan to record games or other apps with landscape screen, please set Video orientation to Landscape.

If you select Auto orientation, the orientation of recorded video will depend on screen orientation at the moment of start recording."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google doesn't provide API for recording internal audio on Android 5.0 or higher. Therefore currently AZ Screen Recorder only supports recording sound via microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google doesn't allow to access microphone in parallel. That means the Video call app and AZ Screen Recorder can not record sound at same time."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "If you try to record a movie of an entertainment app (like Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), you might get a blank video with audio only.

It is the copy right issue.These apps can prevent users from screen recording to protect their content."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "If you cannot open recorded video with any media player, that means recorded video is corrupted. The most common reason is system killed the record-service.

While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "It seems to be a problem of your ROM. Somehow the screencast feature doesn't work.

Please open Settings - Encoder and enable Fix green screen mode. You also should try to record with different resolutions.

If you still get this problem, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com for support."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "It seems to be a problem of WhatsApp's video compression. WhatsApp compresses videos before sharing them. This process ruins some videos. If you can upload videos to Youtube, Facebook without problems, that means the recorded videos are fine.

You should contact WhatsApp to report the problem of video compression."
"video_audio_question_2" : "Why cannot I record system audio (internal sound, game sound)?"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "Trên Android 5.1 bạn có thể gặp lỗi Ứng dụng đã dừng nếu như bạn chọn Không hiển thị lại trong hội thoại cấp quyền ghi màn hình.

Đây là một vấn đề của Android 5.1. Vì thế cách duy nhất để giải quyết là cài đặt lại AZ Screen Recorder và nhớ không chọn KHÔNG HIỂN THỊ LẠI trong hội thoại cấp quyền ghi hình."

"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Bạn hãy vào phần cài đặt của ứng dụng và giảm dần độ phân giải cũng như tốc độ khung hình. Nếu như tình trạng này vẫn tiếp tục bạn hãy liên hệ với chúng tôi qua mail az.screen.recorder@gmail.com để nhận được hỗ trợ"

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "Tác vụ ghi hình luôn chạy ngầm và có độ ưu tiên thấp hơn so với những ứng dụng đang chạy trên màn hình.

Ghi video từ màn hình là một tác vụ nặng và đòi hỏi nhiều tài nguyên của máy. Vì vậy đôi khi hệ thống buộc phải huỷ tác vụ ghi hình để tiết kiệm bộ nhớ, pin và các tài nguyên khác cho những ứng dụng có độ ưu tiên cao hơn.

Trong trường hợp này, chúng tôi khuyên bạn nên giảm độ phân giải, bitrate và độ dài của video để ghi hình ổn định hơn."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Chuyển video thành GIF với quá nhiều khung hình hoặc chất lượng quá cao có thể gây ra crash. 

Để kiểm soát số lượng khung hình, hãy phối hợp FPS và độ dài video sao cho số khung hình không vượt quá 150. 

Chúng tôi khuyên bạn nên chọn chất lượng trung bình (nhỏ hơn 7) và độ lớn ảnh 0.5."

"crashes_errors_question_4" : "Tại sao ứng dụng bị khi đang chuyển video thành GIF?"

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Có, nếu bạn đã mua bản cao cấp (Premium), bạn có thể sử dụng nó trên tất cả các thiết bị Android 5.0+.

Để sử dụng phiên bản cao cấp trên các thiết bị mới, hãy mở Cài đặt của máy, vào phần Tài khoản và đăng nhập với tài khoản Google mà bạn đã sử dụng để mua bản premium. Sau đó bạn hãy bật CH Play và cài đặt AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Đây là các bước để lấy lại bản premium: 

Bước 1. Hãy mở Cài đặt của máy và chắc chắn rằng bạn đã đăng nhập với tài khoản Google mà bạn sử dụng để mua bản premium. Nếu như bạn chưa đăng nhập, vui lòng đăng nhập và cài đặt lại AZ Screen Recorder. 

Bước 2. Nếu như bước 1 không giúp bạn, vui lòng kiểm tra xem có bao nhiêu tài khoản Google trong Cài đặt của máy? Nếu chỉ có một, hãy xoá xữ liệu lưu trữ tạm thời của CH Play và cài đặt lại AZ Screen Recorder. Nếu như có một vài tài khoản, vui lòng gỡ bỏ toàn bộ ngoại trừ tài khoản chính. Sau đó hãy cài đặt lại AZ Screen Recorder. Khi bạn đã lấy lại được bản premium, bạn có thể thêm các tài khoản đã bị gỡ. 

Bước 3. Nếu cả hai bước trên đều chưa giải quyết được vấn đề, vui lòng liên hệ với chúng tôi tại az.screen.recorder@gmail.com để được giúp đỡ."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "Chúng tôi áp dụng chính sách hoàn trả trong 3 ngày. Nếu như bạn vẫn đang trong 3 ngày dùng thử và bạn muốn hoàn lại tiền, vui lòng gửi email cho chúng tôi tại az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Trong email bạn hãy cung cấp cho chúng tôi thông tin mua hàng của bạn, bao gồm ID của đơn hàng và thời gian mua hàng."

"donate_upgrade_question_3" : "Tôi muốn hoàn lại tiền. Tôi phải làm gì?"

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "Nếu như bạn đang sử dụng Android 4.4 hoặc thấp hơn, bạn không thể tải AZ Screen Recorder. Ứng dụng của chúng tôi chỉ dành cho các máy chạy Android 5.0 và cao hơn.

Nếu như máy của bạn chạy Android 5.0+, có thể loại máy của bạn đang trong danh sách đen của chúng tôi. Nghĩa là máy của bạn gặp rất nhiều vấn đề với ghi màn hình, vì thế chúng tôi tạm thời loại bỏ nó khỏi danh sách các thiết bị mà chúng tôi hỗ trợ.

Nếu như bạn vẫn muốn dùng thử AZ Screen Recorder, hãy gửi email cho chúng tôi tại az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "Nếu như bạn đã bật chức năng Hiển thị điểm chạm trong AZ Screen Recorder, nó sẽ bắt đầu làm việc sau khi bật ứng dụng và dừng sau khi thoát ứng dụng.

Chúng tôi coi rằng ứng dụng được thoát nếu như người dùng nhấn nút THU GỌN trên thanh điều khiển.

Trong trường hợp AZ Screen Recorder không được thoát bình thường và chức năng Hiển thị điểm chạm vẫn tiếp tục làm việc, bạn có thể tắt nó bằng cách mở Cài đặt của máy, đến Tuỳ chọn nhà phát triển."

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "Trên một vài máy Xiaomi, Meizu POP-UP WINDOW bị vô hiệu hoá. Vì thế thanh điều khiển nổi của AZ Screen Recorder không được hiển thị.

Hãy vào phần Thông tin ứng dụng của AZ Screen Recorder và cấp quyền POP-UP WINDOW (Alert)"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Hãy bật Tuỳ chỉnh - Cấu hình video - Hướng. Nếu như bạn dự định ghi hình game hoặc các ứng dụng khác có màn hình ngang, vui lòng  lựa chọn hướng của video là Ngang.

Nếu bạn chọn TỰ ĐỘNG, hướng của video sẽ phụ thuộc vào hướng của màn hình tại thời điểm bắt đầu ghi hình"

"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google không cung cấp tính năng cho phép ghi lại âm thanh trong máy trên các thiết bị chạy Android 5.0 hoặc cao hơn. Vì thế hiện nay AZ Screen Recorder chỉ hỗ trợ ghi âm qua microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google không cho phép sử dụng microphone đồng thời. Điều đó có nghĩa là ứng dụng gọi điện và AZ Screen Recorder không thể cùng một lúc ghi lại âm thanh."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "Nếu như bạn cố gắng ghi lại phim, clip của các ứng dụng giải trí (như Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), có thể bạn sẽ nhận được video rỗng chỉ có âm thanh.

Đây là vấn đề liên quan tới bản quyền. Những ứng dụng này có thể ngăn chặn người dùng ghi lại màn hình để bảo vệ nội dung của nó khỏi bị xâm phạm."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "Nếu như bạn không thể xem video bằng bất kì chương trình chơi video nào, có thể video đã bị hỏng. Nguyên nhân phổ biến nhất là hệ thống đã huỷ tác vụ ghi hình.

Tác vụ ghi hình luôn chạy ngầm và có độ ưu tiên thấp hơn so với những ứng dụng đang chạy trên màn hình.

Ghi video từ màn hình là một tác vụ nặng và đòi hỏi nhiều tài nguyên của máy. Vì vậy đôi khi hệ thống buộc phải huỷ tác vụ ghi hình để tiết kiệm bộ nhớ, pin và các tài nguyên khác cho những ứng dụng có độ ưu tiên cao hơn. 

Trong trường hợp này, chúng tôi khuyên bạn nên giảm độ phân giải, bitrate và độ dài của video để ghi hình ổn định hơn."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "Đây dường như là một vấn đề của hệ điều hành. Vì lý do nào đó mà chức năng ghi màn hình không hoạt động.

Bạn hãy vào Cài đặt - Chế độ ghi hình và bật chế độ sửa lỗi màn hình xanh.Bạn cũng nên thử ghi hình với nhiều độ phân giải khác nhau.

Nếu những cách trên không khắc phục được lỗi này, vui lòng liên hệ với chúng tôi tại az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"video_audio_answer_7" : "Đây là vấn đề phát sinh bởi quá trình nén video của WhatsApp. WhatsApp thường nén video trước khi chia sẻ chúng. Chính quá trình này làm hỏng một vài video. Nếu như bạn có thể upload video lên Youtube, Facebook mà không gặp vấn đề gì, có nghĩa là những video bạn ghi được đều ổn.

Bạn nên liên hệ với WhatsApp để thông báo về lỗi khi nén video."

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "On Android 5.1, you will get System UI Crash if you select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog.

It is a problem of Android 5.1. Therefore the only way to solve it is reinstall AZ Screen Recorder and remember to not select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Incompatible resolution maybe cause bug like that, so we recommend you to reduce resolution for better recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converting video to GIF with too many frames or too high quality may cause crash.

For control total frames, please select a combination of FPS and length, which gives less than 150 frames.

We recommend to select normal quality (less than 7) and 0.5 scale size."

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Yes, if you bought premium version, you can use it on all Android 5.0+ devices.

To use premium version on a new device, please open Settings of device - Accounts and sign in with the Google Account that was used for purchase. Then go to Google Play Store and install AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Here is the procedure of getting premium version back: 

STEP 1. Please open Settings of your device and make sure that you signed in with the main Google Account, which was used for purchase. If you did not, please sign in and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. 

STEP 2. If first step doesn't help, please check: How many Google Accounts are there in Settings of your device? If there is only one, please clear data of Google Play Store and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. If there are several Accounts, please remove all of them except the main Account. Then reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. When you get premium verison back, you can add the removed Accounts back. 

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "We apply 3 days refund policy. If you are still in the 3 days trial period and you want a refund, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Remember to give us your order details including order ID and purchase time."
"donate_upgrade_question_1" : "Can I use premium version on different devices?"
"donate_upgrade_question_2" : "I lost premium version. How can I get it back?"

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "If you are using Android 4.4 or lower, you cannot download AZ Screen Recorder. Our app is only available for devices running Android 5.0 or higher.

If you are using Android 5.0+, maybe your device is in our blacklist. Your device has many problems with screen recording, so we temporarily remove it from list of supported devices.

If you still want to try AZ Screen Recorder, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "If you enabled Show touches in AZ Screen Recorder, it will work after opening app and stop working after exit app. 

We consider that app is exited if user clicks the EXIT (4th) button of the floating control bar. 

In case AZ Screen Recorder is not exited normally and the Show touches continues working, you can disable it by going to Developer Options in Settings of your phone"

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "On some Xiaomi, Meizu… devices POP-UP WINDOW is disabled by default. Therefore the floating control bar of AZ Screen Recorder cannot be shown.

Please open AppInfo of AZ Screen Recorder and grant the POP-UP WINDOW (Alert) permisson>"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Please open Settings - Video Configuration - Orientation. If you plan to record games or other apps with landscape screen, please set Video orientation to Landscape.

If you select Auto orientation, the orientation of recorded video will depend on screen orientation at the moment of start recording."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google doesn't provide API for recording internal audio on Android 5.0 or higher. Therefore currently AZ Screen Recorder only supports recording sound via microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google doesn't allow to access microphone in parallel. That means the Video call app and AZ Screen Recorder can not record sound at same time."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "If you try to record a movie of an entertainment app (like Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), you might get a blank video with audio only.

It is the copy right issue.These apps can prevent users from screen recording to protect their content."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "If you cannot open recorded video with any media player, that means recorded video is corrupted. The most common reason is system killed the record-service.

While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "It seems to be a problem of your ROM. Somehow the screencast feature doesn't work.

Please open Settings - Encoder and enable Fix green screen mode. You also should try to record with different resolutions.

If you still get this problem, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com for support."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "It seems to be a problem of WhatsApp's video compression. WhatsApp compresses videos before sharing them. This process ruins some videos. If you can upload videos to Youtube, Facebook without problems, that means the recorded videos are fine.

You should contact WhatsApp to report the problem of video compression."

"video_audio_question_3" : "Why is there no sound (audio) when I record a video call?"

"video_audio_question_6" : "Why do I always get videos with green screen?"
"video_audio_question_7" : "Why are some videos ruined after sharing via WhatsApp?"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "On Android 5.1, you will get System UI Crash if you select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog.

It is a problem of Android 5.1. Therefore the only way to solve it is reinstall AZ Screen Recorder and remember to not select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Incompatible resolution maybe cause bug like that, so we recommend you to reduce resolution for better recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converting video to GIF with too many frames or too high quality may cause crash.

For control total frames, please select a combination of FPS and length, which gives less than 150 frames.

We recommend to select normal quality (less than 7) and 0.5 scale size."

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "Στο Android 5.1, θα έχετε κρασαρίσματα του συστήματος UI αν επιλέξετε το Να μην εμφανιστεί ξανά στο παράθυρο άδειας καταγραφής

Είναι πρόβλημα του Android 5.1. Επομένως ο μόνος τρόπος να το διορθώσετε είναι να ξανά κάνετε εγκατάσταση του AZ Screen Recorder και να θυμηθείτε να μην επιλέξετε το Να μην εμφανιστεί ξανά στο παράθυρο άδειας καταγραφής."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Ασύμβατες αναλύσεις μπορεί να παρουσιάσουν πρόβλημα σαν κι αυτό, οπότε εμείς προτείνουμε να μειώσετε την ανάλυση για καλύτερη εγγραφή."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "Κατά τη διάρκεια της εγγραφής η υπηρεσίας εγγραφής εκτελείται στο παρασκήνιο και έχει χαμηλότερη προτεραιότητα από άλλες εφαρμογές, οι οποίες τρέχουν στο προσκήνιο.

Η εγγραφή οθόνης είναι μια βαριά εργασία και απαιτεί πολλούς πόρους. Επομένως, μερικές φορές το σύστημά πρέπει να διακόψει την υπηρεσία εγγραφής για να σώσει αποθηκευτικό χώρο, μπαταρία και άλλους πόρους για εφαρμογές υψηλότερης προτεραιότητας.

Συνιστάται η μείωση της ανάλυσης, του bitrate και του μήκους του βίντεο για πιο σταθερή εγγραφή."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Η μετατροπή ενός βίντεο σε GIF με πάρα πολλά καρέ η πολύ υψηλή ανάλυση μπορεί να προκαλέσει κρασάρισμα.

Για να ελέγξετε τα συνολικά καρέ, παρακαλώ δοκιμάστε συνδυασμό από FPS και μήκος, που δίνει λιγότερα από 150 καρέ σύνολο.

Εμείς προτείνουμε να επιλέξετε κανονική ποιότητα (μικρότερη από 7) και 0.5 μέγεθος κλίμακας."
"crashes_errors_question_1" : "Γιατί έχω κρασαρίσματα του συστήματος UI στο Android 5.1;"
"crashes_errors_question_2" : "Γιατί η εφαρμογή σταματάει αμέσως μετα το ξεκίνημα της εγγραφής;"
"crashes_errors_question_4" : "Γιατί πήρα κρασάρισμα κατά τη μετατροπή του βίντεο σε GIF;"

"dialog_already_have_premium_msg" : "Αν αγοράσατε την έκδοση premium, μπορείτε να την χρησιμοποιήσετε σε όλες σας τις συσκευές. Παρακαλώ ανοίξτε τις Ρυθμίσεις τις συσκευής - Λογαριασμοί και Σύνδεση με το λογαριασμό Google που είχε χρησιμοποιηθεί για την αγορά. Μετα ξανα πηγαίντε στο Google Play Store και εγκαταστήστε την εφαρμογή. Αν έχετε οποιαδήποτε προβλήματα με την αγορά της premium έκδοσης παρακαλούμε επικοινωνήστε μαζί μας για υποστήριξη."

If you don't know how to grant this permission, please watch the video tutorial."

"dialog_overlay_msg" : "Φως φίλτρου, οθόνη σκωτεινή, τα μάτια προστάτης εφαρμογή μπορεί να σας αποτρέψει από το πάτημα των πλήκτρων του διαλόγου σύλληψης. Εάν αντιμετωπίζετε αυτό το πρόβλημα, θα πρέπει να απενεργοποιήσετε αυτές τις εφαρμογές πριν την έναρξη της εγγραφής."

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Ναι, αν έχετε αγοράσει την έκδοση premium, μπορείτε να την χρησιμοποιήσετε σε όλες τις συσκευές με Android 5.0+.

Για να χρησιμοποιήσετε την έκδοση premium σε νεα συσκευή, παρακαλώ ανοίξτε τις Ρυθμίσεις της συσκευής - Λογαριασμοί και κάντε είσοδο με το Λογαριασμό Google που είχε χρησιμοποιηθεί για την αγορά. Μετα πηγαίντε στο Google Play Store και κάντε εγκατάσταση του AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Παρακάτω αναγράφεται η διαδικασία για να πάρετε την έκδοση premium πίσω: 

Βήμα 1. Παρακαλώ ανοίξτε τις Ρυθμίσεις της συσκευής σας και βεβαιωθείτε οτι έχετε συνδεθεί με το κύριο Λογαριασμό Google που είχε χρησιμοποιηθεί για την αγορά. Εάν δεν το έχετε κάνει, παρακαλούμε συνδεθείτε και επανεγκαταστήστε το AZ Screen Recorder. 

Βήμα 2. Αν το πρώτα βήμα δεν βοηθήσει, παρακαλώ ελέγξτε: Πόσοι Λογαριασμοί Google υπάρχουν στις Ρυθμίσεις της συσκευής σας; Εάν υπάρχει μόνο ένας, διαγράψτε τα δεδομένα του Google Play Store και εγκαταστήστε ξανά το AZ Screen Recorder. Εάν υπάρχουν πολλοί Λογαριασμοί, αφαιρέστε όλους τους λογαριασμούς εκτός από τον κύριο λογαριασμό. Μετά εγκαταστήστε ξανά το AZ Screen Recorder. Όταν πάρετε πίσω την έκδοση premium, μπορείτε να ξανά προσθέσετε τους λογαριασμούς που είχατε αφαιρέσει. 

Βήμα 3. Αν και τα δύο βήματα παραπάνω δεν βοηθήσουν, παρακαλούμε επικοινωνήστε μαζί μας στη διεύθυνση az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "Εφαρμόζουμε 3 μέρες πολιτική επιστροφής χρημάτων. Αν είστε ακόμα στη τρίτη μέρα της δοκιμαστικής περιόδου και θέλετε επιστροφή χρημάτων, παρακαλούμε στείλτε μας email στη διεύθυνση az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Θυμηθείτε να μας δώσετε τα στοιχεία της παραγγελίας σας, συμπεριλαμβανομένου του αναγνωριστικού παραγγελίας και του χρόνου αγοράς."
"donate_upgrade_question_1" : "Μπορώ να χρησιμοποιήσω την έκδοση premium σε άλλες συσκευές;"
"donate_upgrade_question_2" : "Έχασα την έκδοση premium. Πως μπορώ να την πάρω πίσω;"

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "Αν χρησιμοποιείτε Android 4.4 η παλιότερο, δε μπορείτε να εγκαταστήσετε το AZ Screen Recorder. Η εφαρμογή μας είναι διαθέσιμη μόνο για συσκευές που τρέχουν Android 5.0 ή νεότερο.

Αν χρησιμοποιείτε Android 5.0+, μπορεί η συσκευή σας είναι στη μαύρη λίστα μας. Η συσκευή σας έχει πολλά προβλήματα με την εγγραφή οθόνης, οπότε την αφαιρούμε προσωρινά απο την λίστα υποστηριζόμενων συσκευών.

Αν θέλετε ακόμα να δοκιμάσετε το AZ Screen Recorder, παρακαλούμε στείλτε μας email στη διεύθυνση az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "Αν έχετε ενεργοποιήσει την Εμφάνιση αγγιγμάτων στο AZ Screen Recorder, θα λειτουργεί μετά το άνοιγμα της εφαρμογής και θα σταματάει μετά από την έξοδο από την εφαρμογή. 

Θεωρούμε οτι έχει γίνει έξοδος από την εφαρμογή αν ο χρήστης πατήσει το κουμπί εξόδου (4ο) κουμπί της αιωρούμενης μπάρας ελέγχου. 

Σε περίπτωση που δεν έχει γίνει κανονικά έξοδος απο το AZ Screen Recorder και η Εμφάνιση αγγιγμάτων συνεχίζει να λειτουργεί, μπορείτε να την απενεργοποιήσετε πηγαίνοντας στις Επιλογές για προγραμματιστές στις Ρυθμίσεις του τηλεφώνου σας"

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "Σε μερικές Xiaomi, Meizu… συσκευές η Σχεδίαση πάνω απο άλλες εφαρμογές είναι απενεργοποιημένη από προεπιλογή. Επομένως η αιωρούμενη μπάρα ελέγχου του AZ Screen Recorder δε μπορεί να εμφανιστεί.

Παρακαλώ ανοίξτε τις Πληροφορίες Εφαρμογής του AZ Screen Recorder και δώστε την άδεια POP-UP ΠΑΡΆΘΥΡΟ (Ειδοποίηση)>"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Παρακαλώ ανοίξτε τις Ρυθμίσεις - Διαμόρφωση Βίντεο - Προσανατολισμός. Αν σκοπεύετε να κάνετε εγγραφή παιχνιδιών η άλλες εφαρμογές με οριζόντια οθόνη, παρακαλώ ρυθμίστε τον προσανατολισμό του βίντεο σε οριζόντιο.

Αν επιλέξετε Αυτόματο προσανατολισμό, ο προσανατολισμός του εγγεγραμένου βίντεο θα εξαρτηθεί από το προσανατολισμό της οθόνης τη στιγμή της έναρξης εγγραφής."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Η Google δεν προμυθεύει API για εγγραφή εσωτερικού ήχου στο Android 5.0 και νεότερο. Επομένως το AZ Screen Recorder προς το παρών υποστηρίζει μόνο εγγραφή μέσω μικροφώνου."

"video_audio_answer_3" : "Η Google δεν επιτρέπει τη ταυτόχρονη χρήση του μικροφώνου. Αυτό σημαίνει οτι η εφαρμογή βιντεοκλήσεων και το AZ Screen Recorder δεν μπορούν να κάνουν εγγραφή ήχου την ίδια στιγμή."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "Αν προσπαθήσετε να κάνετε εγγραφή μιας ταινίας απο εφαρμογές ψυχαγωγίας (όπως το Netflix, το Telly, το OSN Play…), μπορεί να πάρετε κενό βίντεο με μόνο ήχο.

Είναι το θέμα πνευματικών δικαιωμάτων. Αυτές οι εφαρμογές μπορούν να αποτρέψουν τους χρήστες από το να κάνουν εγγραφή οθόνης για να προστατέψουν το περιεχόμενο τους."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "Αν δεν μπορείτε να ανοίξετε το εγγεγραμμένο βίντεο με οποιαδήποτε εφαρμογή αναπαραγωγής πολυμέσων, αυτό σημαίνει ότι το εγγεγραμμένο βίντεο είναι κατεστραμμένο. Ο συνηθέστερος λόγος είναι ότι το σύστημα σταμάτησε την υπηρεσία εγγραφής.

Κατά τη διάρκεια της εγγραφής η υπηρεσίας εγγραφής εκτελείται στο παρασκήνιο και έχει χαμηλότερη προτεραιότητα από άλλες εφαρμογές, οι οποίες τρέχουν στο προσκήνιο.

Η εγγραφή οθόνης είναι μια βαριά εργασία και απαιτεί πολλούς πόρους. Επομένως, μερικές φορές το σύστημά πρέπει να διακόψει την υπηρεσία εγγραφής για να σώσει αποθηκευτικό χώρο, μπαταρία και άλλους πόρους για εφαρμογές υψηλότερης προτεραιότητας.

Συνιστάται η μείωση της ανάλυσης, του bitrate και του μήκους του βίντεο για πιο σταθερή εγγραφή."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "Φαίνεται να είναι πρόβλημα τις ROM σας. Κατά κάποιο τρόπο η δυνατότητα μετάδοσης της οθόνης δεν λειτουργεί.

Παρακαλώ ανοίξτε τις Ρυθμίσεις - Κωδικοποιητής και επιλέξτε Διόρθωση πράσινης οθόνης. Θα πρέπει επίσης να δοκιμάσετε να κάνετε εγγραφή με διαφορετικές αναλύσεις.

Αν συνεχίζεται να έχετε αυτό το πρόβλημα, παρακαλούμε επικοινωνήστε ναζι μας στη διεύθυνση az.screen.recorder@gmail.com για υποστήριξη."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "Φαίνεται να είναι πρόβλημα της συμπίεσης βίντεο του WhatsApp. Το WhatsApp συμπιέζει τα βίντεο πριν τα κοινοποιήσει. Αυτή η διαδικασία καταστρέφει μερικά βίντεο. Αν μπορείτε να ανεβάσετε τα βίντεο στο Youtube ή το Facebook χωρίς προβλήματα, αυτο σημαίνει ότι τα βίντεο είναι μια χαρά.

Θα πρέπει να επικοινωνήσετε με το WhatsApp για να αναφέρετε το πρόβλημα της συμπίεσης των βίντεο."
"video_audio_question_2" : "Γιατί δε μπορώ να κάνω εγγραφή του ήχου συστήματος (εσωτερικός ήχος, ήχος παιχνιδιού);"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "On Android 5.1, you will get System UI Crash if you select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog.

It is a problem of Android 5.1. Therefore the only way to solve it is reinstall AZ Screen Recorder and remember to not select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Incompatible resolution maybe cause bug like that, so we recommend you to reduce resolution for better recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converting video to GIF with too many frames or too high quality may cause crash.

For control total frames, please select a combination of FPS and length, which gives less than 150 frames.

We recommend to select normal quality (less than 7) and 0.5 scale size."

"crashes_errors_question_2" : "Why does app crash immediately after start recording?"
"crashes_errors_question_4" : "Why did I get crash while converting video to GIF?"

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Yes, if you bought premium version, you can use it on all Android 5.0+ devices.

To use premium version on a new device, please open Settings of device - Accounts and sign in with the Google Account that was used for purchase. Then go to Google Play Store and install AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Here is the procedure of getting premium version back: 

STEP 1. Please open Settings of your device and make sure that you signed in with the main Google Account, which was used for purchase. If you did not, please sign in and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. 

STEP 2. If first step doesn't help, please check: How many Google Accounts are there in Settings of your device? If there is only one, please clear data of Google Play Store and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. If there are several Accounts, please remove all of them except the main Account. Then reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. When you get premium verison back, you can add the removed Accounts back. 

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "We apply 3 days refund policy. If you are still in the 3 days trial period and you want a refund, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Remember to give us your order details including order ID and purchase time."

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "If you are using Android 4.4 or lower, you cannot download AZ Screen Recorder. Our app is only available for devices running Android 5.0 or higher.

If you are using Android 5.0+, maybe your device is in our blacklist. Your device has many problems with screen recording, so we temporarily remove it from list of supported devices.

If you still want to try AZ Screen Recorder, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "If you enabled Show touches in AZ Screen Recorder, it will work after opening app and stop working after exit app. 

We consider that app is exited if user clicks the EXIT (4th) button of the floating control bar. 

In case AZ Screen Recorder is not exited normally and the Show touches continues working, you can disable it by going to Developer Options in Settings of your phone"

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "On some Xiaomi, Meizu… devices POP-UP WINDOW is disabled by default. Therefore the floating control bar of AZ Screen Recorder cannot be shown.

Please open AppInfo of AZ Screen Recorder and grant the POP-UP WINDOW (Alert) permisson>"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Please open Settings - Video Configuration - Orientation. If you plan to record games or other apps with landscape screen, please set Video orientation to Landscape.

If you select Auto orientation, the orientation of recorded video will depend on screen orientation at the moment of start recording."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google doesn't provide API for recording internal audio on Android 5.0 or higher. Therefore currently AZ Screen Recorder only supports recording sound via microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google doesn't allow to access microphone in parallel. That means the Video call app and AZ Screen Recorder can not record sound at same time."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "If you try to record a movie of an entertainment app (like Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), you might get a blank video with audio only.

It is the copy right issue.These apps can prevent users from screen recording to protect their content."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "If you cannot open recorded video with any media player, that means recorded video is corrupted. The most common reason is system killed the record-service.

While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "It seems to be a problem of your ROM. Somehow the screencast feature doesn't work.

Please open Settings - Encoder and enable Fix green screen mode. You also should try to record with different resolutions.

If you still get this problem, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com for support."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "It seems to be a problem of WhatsApp's video compression. WhatsApp compresses videos before sharing them. This process ruins some videos. If you can upload videos to Youtube, Facebook without problems, that means the recorded videos are fine.

You should contact WhatsApp to report the problem of video compression."

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "Na Androidzie 5.1 będą błędy interfejsu jeśli wybierzesz Nie pokazuj ponownie przy pytaniu o uprawnienia do nagrywania ekranu.

Jest to problem związany z Androidem 5.1. Jedyna droga aby rozwiązać ten problem to przeinstalowanie AZ Screen Recorder i pamiętaj aby nie zaznaczać Nie pokazuj ponownie przy pytaniu o uprawnienia do nagrywania."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Sprawdź rodzaj użytego kodera. Standardowy koder może nie działać na niektórych urządzeniach. W takim przypadku przełącz na koder zaawansowany."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "Podczas nagrywania proces nagrywania uruchomiony jest w tle i ma niższy priorytet niż inne aplikacje, które są na pierwszym planie.

Nagrywanie wideo wymaga dużych zasobów systemowych. Dlatego czasem system musi wyłączyć proces nagrywania aby zaoszczędzić pamięć, baterię i inne zasoby dla aplikacji o wyższym priorytecie.

Proponujemy zmniejszyć rozdzielczość, bitrate i długość filmu aby uzyskać bardziej stabilne nagrywanie."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Konwersja filmu na GIF ze zbyt dużą ilością klatek lub ze zbyt dużą jakością może powodować błędy.

Aby mieć kontrolę nad ilością kaltek użyj kombinacji ilości klatek na sekundę i długości tak, żeby dawały mniej niż 150 klatek. Rekomendujemy ustawić jakość normalną (mniej niż 7) i skalę 0.5."
"crashes_errors_question_2" : "Dlaczego aplikacja się wysypuje po włączeniu nagrywania?"
"crashes_errors_question_4" : "Dlaczego mam błąd podczas konwersji filmu na GIF?"

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Tak, możesz używać wersji premium na wszystkich urządzeniach z Androidem 5.0 lub nowszym.

Aby użyć wersji premium na kolejnym urządzeniu wejdź w Ustawienia urządzenia - Konta i zaloguj się poprzez konto Google które było użyte do zakupu wersji premium. Potem wejź do sklepu Play i zainstaluj AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Procedura przywracania wersji premium: 

KROK 1. Otwórz UStawienia i sprawdź czy jesteś zalogowany przez konto Google, które było użyte do zakupu wersji premium. Jeśli nie, zaloguj się z właściwego konta i przeinstaluj AZ Screen Recorder. 

KROK 2. Jeżeli pierwszy krok nie pomógł, sprawdź ile kont Google jest w ustawieniach urządzenia. Jeżeli jest tylko jedno wyczyść dane sklepu Google Play i przeinstaluj AZ Screen Recorder. Jeśli jest kilka kont usuń wszystkie oprócz głównego i przeinstaluj AZ Screen Recorder. Po odzyskaniu wersji premium możesz dodać usunięte konta. 

KROK 3. Jeśli oba powyższe kroki nie dały rezultatu, skontaktuj się z nami: az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "Mamy 3 dniową politykę zwrotów. Jeżeli jesteś na 3 dniowym okresie próbnym i chciałbyś zwrot, skontaktuj się z nami przez maila az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Pamiętaj aby podać nam szczegóły zamówienia, w szczególności ID zamówienia i datę zakupu."

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "Jeżeli w AZ Screen Recorder włączysz Pokazuj dotyk będzie to działać po uruchomieniu programu i po jego zamknięciu.

"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google nie udostępnia API pozwalającego nagrywać dźwięk na Androidzie 5.0 i nowszym z poziomu systemu. Dlatego AZ Screen Recorder umożliwia nagrywanie dźwięku tylko przez mikrofon."

"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google nie pozwala na jednoczesny dostęp do mikrofonu przez kilka aplikacji. Oznacza to, że nie można jednocześnie prowadzić wideorozmowy i nagrywać dźwięk używając AZ Screen Recorder."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "Jeśli będziesz próbował nagrać film z aplikacji z treściami wideo (np. Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), możesz otrzymać puste wideo tylko z dźwiękiem. Spowodowane jest to prawami autorskimi. Te aplikacje mogą blokować nagrywanie wideo w celu ochrony wyświetlanych treści."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "Jeśli nie możesz odtworzyć nagranego filmu za pomocą żadnego odtwarzacza, oznacza to że plik jest uszkodzony. Najpopularniejszą przyczyną jest to, że system wyłaczył proces nagrywania wideo.

 Podczas nagrywania proces nagrywania uruchomiony jest w tle i ma niższy priorytet niż inne aplikacje, które są na pierwszym planie.

Nagrywanie wideo wymaga dużych zasobów systemowych. Dlatego czasem system musi wyłączyć proces nagrywania aby zaoszczędzić pamięć, baterię i inne zasoby dla aplikacji o wyższym priorytecie.

Proponujemy zmniejszyć rozdzielczość, bitrate i długość filmu aby uzyskać bardziej stabilne nagrywanie."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "Jest to wina Twojego ROM-u. Prawdopodobnie udostępnianie ekranu nie działa.

Skontaktuj się z producentem ROM-u i zgłoś ten błąd."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "Jest to wina kompresji filmów używanej przez WhatsApp. WhatsApp kompresuje filmy przed ich udostępnieniem. Ten proces powoduje utratę jakości niektórych filmów. Jeśli możesz bez problemu wrzucić filmy na Youtube lub Facebooka oznacza to że nagrywanie filmów działa dobrze.

Powinieneś zgłosić do WhatsApp problem z kompresją filmów."
"video_audio_question_2" : "Dlaczego nie mogę nagrać dźwięku bezpośrednio (wewnętrzne dźwięki, dźwięki z gier)?"
"video_audio_question_3" : "Dlaczego nie ma dźwięku gdy nagrywam rozmowę wideo?"
"video_audio_question_4" : "Dlaczego w nagraniach jest sam dźwięk (nie ma obrazu)?"
"video_audio_question_6" : "Dlaczego w nagranych filmach zawsze jest zielony ekran?"
"video_audio_question_7" : "Dlaczego niektóre filmy są złej jakości po udostępnieniu ich przez WhatsApp?"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "On Android 5.1, you will get System UI Crash if you select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog.

It is a problem of Android 5.1. Therefore the only way to solve it is reinstall AZ Screen Recorder and remember to not select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Incompatible resolution maybe cause bug like that, so we recommend you to reduce resolution for better recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converting video to GIF with too many frames or too high quality may cause crash.

For control total frames, please select a combination of FPS and length, which gives less than 150 frames.

We recommend to select normal quality (less than 7) and 0.5 scale size."

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Yes, if you bought premium version, you can use it on all Android 5.0+ devices.

To use premium version on a new device, please open Settings of device - Accounts and sign in with the Google Account that was used for purchase. Then go to Google Play Store and install AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Here is the procedure of getting premium version back: 

STEP 1. Please open Settings of your device and make sure that you signed in with the main Google Account, which was used for purchase. If you did not, please sign in and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. 

STEP 2. If first step doesn't help, please check: How many Google Accounts are there in Settings of your device? If there is only one, please clear data of Google Play Store and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. If there are several Accounts, please remove all of them except the main Account. Then reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. When you get premium verison back, you can add the removed Accounts back. 

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "We apply 3 days refund policy. If you are still in the 3 days trial period and you want a refund, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Remember to give us your order details including order ID and purchase time."
"donate_upgrade_question_1" : "Can I use premium version on different devices?"
"donate_upgrade_question_2" : "I lost premium version. How can I get it back?"

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "If you are using Android 4.4 or lower, you cannot download AZ Screen Recorder. Our app is only available for devices running Android 5.0 or higher.

If you are using Android 5.0+, maybe your device is in our blacklist. Your device has many problems with screen recording, so we temporarily remove it from list of supported devices.

If you still want to try AZ Screen Recorder, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "If you enabled Show touches in AZ Screen Recorder, it will work after opening app and stop working after exit app. 

We consider that app is exited if user clicks the EXIT (4th) button of the floating control bar. 

In case AZ Screen Recorder is not exited normally and the Show touches continues working, you can disable it by going to Developer Options in Settings of your phone"

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "On some Xiaomi, Meizu… devices POP-UP WINDOW is disabled by default. Therefore the floating control bar of AZ Screen Recorder cannot be shown.

Please open AppInfo of AZ Screen Recorder and grant the POP-UP WINDOW (Alert) permisson>"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Please open Settings - Video Configuration - Orientation. If you plan to record games or other apps with landscape screen, please set Video orientation to Landscape.

If you select Auto orientation, the orientation of recorded video will depend on screen orientation at the moment of start recording."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google doesn't provide API for recording internal audio on Android 5.0 or higher. Therefore currently AZ Screen Recorder only supports recording sound via microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google doesn't allow to access microphone in parallel. That means the Video call app and AZ Screen Recorder can not record sound at same time."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "If you try to record a movie of an entertainment app (like Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), you might get a blank video with audio only.

It is the copy right issue.These apps can prevent users from screen recording to protect their content."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "If you cannot open recorded video with any media player, that means recorded video is corrupted. The most common reason is system killed the record-service.

While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "It seems to be a problem of your ROM. Somehow the screencast feature doesn't work.

Please open Settings - Encoder and enable Fix green screen mode. You also should try to record with different resolutions.

If you still get this problem, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com for support."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "It seems to be a problem of WhatsApp's video compression. WhatsApp compresses videos before sharing them. This process ruins some videos. If you can upload videos to Youtube, Facebook without problems, that means the recorded videos are fine.

You should contact WhatsApp to report the problem of video compression."

"video_audio_question_3" : "Why is there no sound (audio) when I record a video call?"
"video_audio_question_4" : "Why did I get blank videos with only audio when I record films?"
"video_audio_question_6" : "Why do I always get videos with green screen?"
"video_audio_question_7" : "Why are some videos ruined after sharing via WhatsApp?"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "On Android 5.1, you will get System UI Crash if you select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog.

It is a problem of Android 5.1. Therefore the only way to solve it is reinstall AZ Screen Recorder and remember to not select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Incompatible resolution maybe cause bug like that, so we recommend you to reduce resolution for better recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converting video to GIF with too many frames or too high quality may cause crash.

For control total frames, please select a combination of FPS and length, which gives less than 150 frames.

We recommend to select normal quality (less than 7) and 0.5 scale size."
"crashes_errors_question_1" : "Why do I get System UI crash on Android 5.1?"
"crashes_errors_question_2" : "Why does app crash immediately after start recording?"
"crashes_errors_question_4" : "Why did I get crash while converting video to GIF?"

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Yes, if you bought premium version, you can use it on all Android 5.0+ devices.

To use premium version on a new device, please open Settings of device - Accounts and sign in with the Google Account that was used for purchase. Then go to Google Play Store and install AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Here is the procedure of getting premium version back: 

STEP 1. Please open Settings of your device and make sure that you signed in with the main Google Account, which was used for purchase. If you did not, please sign in and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. 

STEP 2. If first step doesn't help, please check: How many Google Accounts are there in Settings of your device? If there is only one, please clear data of Google Play Store and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. If there are several Accounts, please remove all of them except the main Account. Then reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. When you get premium verison back, you can add the removed Accounts back. 

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "We apply 3 days refund policy. If you are still in the 3 days trial period and you want a refund, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Remember to give us your order details including order ID and purchase time."
"donate_upgrade_question_1" : "Can I use premium version on different devices?"
"donate_upgrade_question_2" : "I lost premium version. How can I get it back?"

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "If you are using Android 4.4 or lower, you cannot download AZ Screen Recorder. Our app is only available for devices running Android 5.0 or higher.

If you are using Android 5.0+, maybe your device is in our blacklist. Your device has many problems with screen recording, so we temporarily remove it from list of supported devices.

If you still want to try AZ Screen Recorder, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "If you enabled Show touches in AZ Screen Recorder, it will work after opening app and stop working after exit app. 

We consider that app is exited if user clicks the EXIT (4th) button of the floating control bar. 

In case AZ Screen Recorder is not exited normally and the Show touches continues working, you can disable it by going to Developer Options in Settings of your phone"

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "On some Xiaomi, Meizu… devices POP-UP WINDOW is disabled by default. Therefore the floating control bar of AZ Screen Recorder cannot be shown.

Please open AppInfo of AZ Screen Recorder and grant the POP-UP WINDOW (Alert) permisson>"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Please open Settings - Video Configuration - Orientation. If you plan to record games or other apps with landscape screen, please set Video orientation to Landscape.

If you select Auto orientation, the orientation of recorded video will depend on screen orientation at the moment of start recording."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google doesn't provide API for recording internal audio on Android 5.0 or higher. Therefore currently AZ Screen Recorder only supports recording sound via microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google doesn't allow to access microphone in parallel. That means the Video call app and AZ Screen Recorder can not record sound at same time."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "If you try to record a movie of an entertainment app (like Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), you might get a blank video with audio only.

It is the copy right issue.These apps can prevent users from screen recording to protect their content."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "If you cannot open recorded video with any media player, that means recorded video is corrupted. The most common reason is system killed the record-service.

While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "It seems to be a problem of your ROM. Somehow the screencast feature doesn't work.

Please open Settings - Encoder and enable Fix green screen mode. You also should try to record with different resolutions.

If you still get this problem, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com for support."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "It seems to be a problem of WhatsApp's video compression. WhatsApp compresses videos before sharing them. This process ruins some videos. If you can upload videos to Youtube, Facebook without problems, that means the recorded videos are fine.

You should contact WhatsApp to report the problem of video compression."
"video_audio_question_2" : "Why cannot I record system audio (internal sound, game sound)?"
"video_audio_question_3" : "Why is there no sound (audio) when I record a video call?"
"video_audio_question_4" : "Why did I get blank videos with only audio when I record films?"
"video_audio_question_6" : "Why do I always get videos with green screen?"
"video_audio_question_7" : "Why are some videos ruined after sharing via WhatsApp?"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "On Android 5.1, you will get System UI Crash if you select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog.

It is a problem of Android 5.1. Therefore the only way to solve it is reinstall AZ Screen Recorder and remember to not select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Incompatible resolution maybe cause bug like that, so we recommend you to reduce resolution for better recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converting video to GIF with too many frames or too high quality may cause crash.

For control total frames, please select a combination of FPS and length, which gives less than 150 frames.

We recommend to select normal quality (less than 7) and 0.5 scale size."

"crashes_errors_question_4" : "Why did I get crash while converting video to GIF?"

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Yes, if you bought premium version, you can use it on all Android 5.0+ devices.

To use premium version on a new device, please open Settings of device - Accounts and sign in with the Google Account that was used for purchase. Then go to Google Play Store and install AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Here is the procedure of getting premium version back: 

STEP 1. Please open Settings of your device and make sure that you signed in with the main Google Account, which was used for purchase. If you did not, please sign in and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. 

STEP 2. If first step doesn't help, please check: How many Google Accounts are there in Settings of your device? If there is only one, please clear data of Google Play Store and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. If there are several Accounts, please remove all of them except the main Account. Then reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. When you get premium verison back, you can add the removed Accounts back. 

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "We apply 3 days refund policy. If you are still in the 3 days trial period and you want a refund, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Remember to give us your order details including order ID and purchase time."
"donate_upgrade_question_1" : "Can I use premium version on different devices?"
"donate_upgrade_question_2" : "I lost premium version. How can I get it back?"

If you are using Android 5.0+, maybe your device is in our blacklist. Your device has many problems with screen recording, so we temporarily remove it from list of supported devices.

If you still want to try AZ Screen Recorder, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "If you enabled Show touches in AZ Screen Recorder, it will work after opening app and stop working after exit app. 

We consider that app is exited if user clicks the EXIT (4th) button of the floating control bar. 

In case AZ Screen Recorder is not exited normally and the Show touches continues working, you can disable it by going to Developer Options in Settings of your phone"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "On Android 5.1, you will get System UI Crash if you select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog.

It is a problem of Android 5.1. Therefore the only way to solve it is reinstall AZ Screen Recorder and remember to not select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Incompatible resolution maybe cause bug like that, so we recommend you to reduce resolution for better recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converting video to GIF with too many frames or too high quality may cause crash.

For control total frames, please select a combination of FPS and length, which gives less than 150 frames.

We recommend to select normal quality (less than 7) and 0.5 scale size."
"crashes_errors_question_1" : "Why do I get System UI crash on Android 5.1?"
"crashes_errors_question_2" : "Why does app crash immediately after start recording?"
"crashes_errors_question_4" : "Why did I get crash while converting video to GIF?"

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Yes, if you bought premium version, you can use it on all Android 5.0+ devices.

To use premium version on a new device, please open Settings of device - Accounts and sign in with the Google Account that was used for purchase. Then go to Google Play Store and install AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Here is the procedure of getting premium version back: 

STEP 1. Please open Settings of your device and make sure that you signed in with the main Google Account, which was used for purchase. If you did not, please sign in and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. 

STEP 2. If first step doesn't help, please check: How many Google Accounts are there in Settings of your device? If there is only one, please clear data of Google Play Store and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. If there are several Accounts, please remove all of them except the main Account. Then reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. When you get premium verison back, you can add the removed Accounts back. 

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "We apply 3 days refund policy. If you are still in the 3 days trial period and you want a refund, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Remember to give us your order details including order ID and purchase time."
"donate_upgrade_question_1" : "Can I use premium version on different devices?"
"donate_upgrade_question_2" : "I lost premium version. How can I get it back?"
