"other_faqs_answer_1" : "If you are using Android 4.4 or lower, you cannot download AZ Screen Recorder. Our app is only available for devices running Android 5.0 or higher.

If you are using Android 5.0+, maybe your device is in our blacklist. Your device has many problems with screen recording, so we temporarily remove it from list of supported devices.

If you still want to try AZ Screen Recorder, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "If you enabled Show touches in AZ Screen Recorder, it will work after opening app and stop working after exit app. 

We consider that app is exited if user clicks the EXIT (4th) button of the floating control bar. 

In case AZ Screen Recorder is not exited normally and the Show touches continues working, you can disable it by going to Developer Options in Settings of your phone"

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "On some Xiaomi, Meizu… devices POP-UP WINDOW is disabled by default. Therefore the floating control bar of AZ Screen Recorder cannot be shown.

Please open AppInfo of AZ Screen Recorder and grant the POP-UP WINDOW (Alert) permisson>"

"other_faqs_question_3" : "Why can't I open AZ Screen Recorder on Xiaomi, Meizu devices?"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Please open Settings - Video Configuration - Orientation. If you plan to record games or other apps with landscape screen, please set Video orientation to Landscape.

If you select Auto orientation, the orientation of recorded video will depend on screen orientation at the moment of start recording."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google doesn't provide API for recording internal audio on Android 5.0 or higher. Therefore currently AZ Screen Recorder only supports recording sound via microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google doesn't allow to access microphone in parallel. That means the Video call app and AZ Screen Recorder can not record sound at same time."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "If you try to record a movie of an entertainment app (like Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), you might get a blank video with audio only.

It is the copy right issue.These apps can prevent users from screen recording to protect their content."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "If you cannot open recorded video with any media player, that means recorded video is corrupted. The most common reason is system killed the record-service.

While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "It seems to be a problem of your ROM. Somehow the screencast feature doesn't work.

Please open Settings - Encoder and enable Fix green screen mode. You also should try to record with different resolutions.

If you still get this problem, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com for support."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "It seems to be a problem of WhatsApp's video compression. WhatsApp compresses videos before sharing them. This process ruins some videos. If you can upload videos to Youtube, Facebook without problems, that means the recorded videos are fine.

You should contact WhatsApp to report the problem of video compression."
"video_audio_question_2" : "Why cannot I record system audio (internal sound, game sound)?"
"video_audio_question_3" : "Why is there no sound (audio) when I record a video call?"
"video_audio_question_4" : "Why did I get blank videos with only audio when I record films?"
"video_audio_question_6" : "Why do I always get videos with green screen?"
"video_audio_question_7" : "Why are some videos ruined after sharing via WhatsApp?"

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Yes, if you bought premium version, you can use it on all Android 5.0+ devices.

To use premium version on a new device, please open Settings of device - Accounts and sign in with the Google Account that was used for purchase. Then go to Google Play Store and install AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Here is the procedure of getting premium version back: 

STEP 1. Please open Settings of your device and make sure that you signed in with the main Google Account, which was used for purchase. If you did not, please sign in and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. 

STEP 2. If first step doesn't help, please check: How many Google Accounts are there in Settings of your device? If there is only one, please clear data of Google Play Store and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. If there are several Accounts, please remove all of them except the main Account. Then reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. When you get premium verison back, you can add the removed Accounts back. 

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "We apply 3 days refund policy. If you are still in the 3 days trial period and you want a refund, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Remember to give us your order details including order ID and purchase time."

If you are using Android 5.0+, maybe your device is in our blacklist. Your device has many problems with screen recording, so we temporarily remove it from list of supported devices.

If you still want to try AZ Screen Recorder, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "If you enabled Show touches in AZ Screen Recorder, it will work after opening app and stop working after exit app. 

We consider that app is exited if user clicks the EXIT (4th) button of the floating control bar.

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Please open Settings - Video Configuration - Orientation. If you plan to record games or other apps with landscape screen, please set Video orientation to Landscape.

If you select Auto orientation, the orientation of recorded video will depend on screen orientation at the moment of start recording."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google doesn't provide API for recording internal audio on Android 5.0 or higher. Therefore currently AZ Screen Recorder only supports recording sound via microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google doesn't allow to access microphone in parallel. That means the Video call app and AZ Screen Recorder can not record sound at same time."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "If you try to record a movie of an entertainment app (like Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), you might get a blank video with audio only.

It is the copy right issue.These apps can prevent users from screen recording to protect their content."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "If you cannot open recorded video with any media player, that means recorded video is corrupted. The most common reason is system killed the record-service.

While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "It seems to be a problem of your ROM. Somehow the screencast feature doesn't work.

Please open Settings - Encoder and enable Fix green screen mode. You also should try to record with different resolutions.

If you still get this problem, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com for support."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "It seems to be a problem of WhatsApp's video compression. WhatsApp compresses videos before sharing them. This process ruins some videos. If you can upload videos to Youtube, Facebook without problems, that means the recorded videos are fine.

You should contact WhatsApp to report the problem of video compression."

"video_audio_question_3" : "Why is there no sound (audio) when I record a video call?"
"video_audio_question_4" : "Why did I get blank videos with only audio when I record films?"
"video_audio_question_6" : "Why do I always get videos with green screen?"
"video_audio_question_7" : "Why are some videos ruined after sharing via WhatsApp?"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "Sur Android 5.1, vous obtiendrez System UI Crash si vous selectionnez Ne plus montrer dans la fenetre des permissions de capture.

Il s'agit d'un probleme lie a Android 5.1. Pour resoudre ce probleme, reinstallez AZ Screen Recorder et ne selectionnez pas Ne plus montrer dans la fenetre des permissions de capture."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Par defaut l'encodeur peut ne pas fonctionner sur certains appareils. Dans ce cas, veuillez utiliser l'encodeur avance."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "Lors de l'enregistrement, le service fonctionne en arriere plan et a une priorite inferieure aux autres applications, qui sont au premier plan.

L'enregistrement de l'ecran est une tache lourde et necessite beaucoup de ressources. Parfois votre systeme doit fermer le service pour sauvegarder la memoire de votre appareil, la batterie et d'autres ressources pour les applications prioritaires.

Nous recommandons de reduire la resolution, le bitrate et/ou la longueur de video pour un enregistrement plus stable."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "La conversion video au format GIF avec trop de cadres ou de trop haute qualite peut causer des problemes.

Veuillez selectionner une combinaison de FPS et une longueur, qui donne moins de 150 cadres.

Nous vous recommandons de selectionner une qualite normale (inferieur a 7) et une taille d'echelle de 0,5."
"crashes_errors_question_1" : "Pourquoi j'obtiens l'erreur System UI crash sur Android 5.1 ?"
"crashes_errors_question_2" : "Pourquoi l'application crash immediatement apres le debut d'enregistrement ?"
"crashes_errors_question_4" : "Pourquoi l'application crash pendant la conversion de video en GIF ?"

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Si vous avez acheter la version prenium, vous pouvez l'utiliser sur tout vos appareils Android 5.0+ .

Pour utiliser la version prenium sur un nouvel appareil, ouvrez les parametres de votre appareil et connecter vous avec le compte Google precedemment utilise pour l'achat. Allez ensuite sur le Google Play Store et installez AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Procedure de recuperation de version prenium : 

ETAPE 1. Ouvrez les parametres de votre appareil et verifiez que vous etes connecte avec le compte Google utiise pour l'achat de la version prenium. Si ce n'est pas le cas, connectez-vous et reinstallez AZ Screen Recorder. 

ETAPE 2. Si la premiere etape ne vous a pas aide, verifiez le nombre de compte Google connecte. S'il n'y en a qu'un, veuillez nettoyer les donnees du Google Play Store et reinstallez AZ Screen Recorder. S'il y en a plusieurs, supprimez les tous sauf le compte utiliser pour l'achat, puis reinstallez AZ Screen Recorder. Quand la version prenium est de nouveau presente, vous pourrez ajouter les comptes Google precedemment supprimes. 

ETAPE 3. Si les deux etapes precedentes n'ont pas fonctionnees, veuillez nous contacter a az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "Nous appliquons une politique de remboursement de 3 jours. Si vous etes toujours dans la periode d'essai de 3 jours et souhaitez un remboursement, envoyez-nous un email a az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

N'oubliez pas de nous fournir votre ID de commande, la date et l'heure de l'achat."
"donate_upgrade_question_1" : "Comment utiliser la version prenium sur different appareil ?"

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "Si vous utilisez Android 4.4 et inferieur, vous ne pourrez pas utiliser AZ Screen Recorder. Notre application est uniquement disponible sur les appareils fonctionnants sur Android 5.0 et superieur.

Si vous utilisez Android 5.0+ et que vous rencontrez des erreurs, votre appareil est probablement sur notre liste noire. Votre appareil rencontre des problemes d'enregistrement video, nous l'avons donc temporairement supprimer des appareils supportes.

Si vous souhaitez essayer AZ Screen Recorder, envoyez-nous un email a az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "L'affichage des touches dans AZ Screen Recorder fonctionne quand l'application est ouverte et s'arrete quand l'application est fermee. 

Nous considerons que l'application est fermee quand vous cliquez sur le bouton quitter (4eme bouton de la barre de controle). 

Dans le cas ou AZ Screen Recorder n'est pas quitte normalement, l'affichage des touches continue de fonctionner. Vous pouvez le desactiver en allant dans les options developpeur des parametres de votre appareil."

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "Sur certains appareils Xiaomi, Meizu… les POP-UP sont desactives par defaut. Pas consequent la barre de controle flottante de AZ Screen Recorder ne peut pas etre affichee.

Veuillez ouvrir AppInfo de AZ Screen Recorder et autoriser les permissions des POP-UP."

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Cela est du a la mauvaise orientation de votre appareil lors de l'enregistrement.

Si vous souhaitez enregistrer des videos a l'horizontale, veuillez selectionner l'option paysage dans Configurations videos.

Si vous selectionner l'optionautomatique, l'orientation de l'enregistrement dependra de l'orientation de votre appareil au debut de l'enregistrement."

"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google ne fournit pas l'API pour l'enregistrement audio interne sur Android 5.0 et superieur. Par consequent AZ Screen Recorder supporte uniquement l'enregistrement audio depuis le microphone."

"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google n'autorise pas d'acces parallele au microphone. Cela veut dire que les applications d'appel video et AZ Screen Recorder ne peuvent pas enregistrer l'audio en meme temps."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "Si vous essayez d'enregistrer une video provenant d'une application de divertissement (Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), vous pourriez obtenir un ecran vierge avec l'audio uniquement.

Cela est du aux droits d'auteurs. Ces droits peuvent empecher les utilisateurs d'enregistrer l'ecran pour proteger leur contenu."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "Si vous ne pouvez pas ouvrir de video enregistree avec un lecteur multimedia, cela signifie que la video enregistree est corrompue. La raison la plus commune est que le systeme a ferme le service d'enregistrement.

Lors de l'enregistrement, le service fonctionne en arriere plan et a une priorite inferieure aux autres applications, qui sont au premier plan.

L'enregistrement de l'ecran necessite beaucoup de ressources. Parfois votre système doit fermer le service pour sauvegarder la memoire de votre appareil, la batterie et d'autres ressources pour les applications prioritaires.

Nous vous recommandons de reduire la resolution, le bitrate et/ou la longueur de video pour un enregistrement plus stable."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "La raison la plus commune est un probleme de comptabilite avec la ROM et la fonction screencast.

Vous devez prendre contact avec le fabricant de la ROM pour repporter ce probleme."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "Il existe un conflit avec la compression video de WhatsApp. En effet, WhatsApp compresse les videos avant de les partager et ce processus pose probleme avec certaines videos. Si vous pouvez telecharger des videos sur YouTube, Facebook, cela signifie que les videos enregistrees sont correctes.

Contactez WhatsApp pour signaler ce probleme de compression video."
"video_audio_question_2" : "Pourquoi je ne peux pas enregistrer l'audio (interne, jeux) ?"
"video_audio_question_3" : "Pourquoi il n'y a pas l'audio quand j'enregiste un appel video ?"
"video_audio_question_4" : "Pourquoi j'obtiens un ecran vierge et l'audio quand j'enregistre un film ?"
"video_audio_question_5" : "Pourquoi je ne peux pas ouvrir une video enregistree ?"
"video_audio_question_7" : "Pourquoi certaines videos posent problemes apres un partage WhatsApp ?"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "On Android 5.1, you will get System UI Crash if you select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog.

It is a problem of Android 5.1. Therefore the only way to solve it is reinstall AZ Screen Recorder and remember to not select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Incompatible resolution maybe cause bug like that, so we recommend you to reduce resolution for better recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converting video to GIF with too many frames or too high quality may cause crash.

For control total frames, please select a combination of FPS and length, which gives less than 150 frames.

We recommend to select normal quality (less than 7) and 0.5 scale size."
"crashes_errors_question_1" : "Why do I get System UI crash on Android 5.1?"
"crashes_errors_question_2" : "Why does app crash immediately after start recording?"
"crashes_errors_question_4" : "Why did I get crash while converting video to GIF?"

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Yes, if you bought premium version, you can use it on all Android 5.0+ devices.

To use premium version on a new device, please open Settings of device - Accounts and sign in with the Google Account that was used for purchase. Then go to Google Play Store and install AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Here is the procedure of getting premium version back: 

STEP 1. Please open Settings of your device and make sure that you signed in with the main Google Account, which was used for purchase. If you did not, please sign in and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. 

STEP 2. If first step doesn't help, please check: How many Google Accounts are there in Settings of your device? If there is only one, please clear data of Google Play Store and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. If there are several Accounts, please remove all of them except the main Account. Then reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. When you get premium verison back, you can add the removed Accounts back. 

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "We apply 3 days refund policy. If you are still in the 3 days trial period and you want a refund, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Remember to give us your order details including order ID and purchase time."
"donate_upgrade_question_1" : "Can I use premium version on different devices?"
"donate_upgrade_question_2" : "I lost premium version. How can I get it back?"

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "If you are using Android 4.4 or lower, you cannot download AZ Screen Recorder. Our app is only available for devices running Android 5.0 or higher.

If you are using Android 5.0+, maybe your device is in our blacklist. Your device has many problems with screen recording, so we temporarily remove it from list of supported devices.

If you still want to try AZ Screen Recorder, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "If you enabled Show touches in AZ Screen Recorder, it will work after opening app and stop working after exit app. 

We consider that app is exited if user clicks the EXIT (4th) button of the floating control bar. 

In case AZ Screen Recorder is not exited normally and the Show touches continues working, you can disable it by going to Developer Options in Settings of your phone"

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "On some Xiaomi, Meizu… devices POP-UP WINDOW is disabled by default. Therefore the floating control bar of AZ Screen Recorder cannot be shown.

Please open AppInfo of AZ Screen Recorder and grant the POP-UP WINDOW (Alert) permisson>"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Please open Settings - Video Configuration - Orientation. If you plan to record games or other apps with landscape screen, please set Video orientation to Landscape.

If you select Auto orientation, the orientation of recorded video will depend on screen orientation at the moment of start recording."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google doesn't provide API for recording internal audio on Android 5.0 or higher. Therefore currently AZ Screen Recorder only supports recording sound via microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google doesn't allow to access microphone in parallel. That means the Video call app and AZ Screen Recorder can not record sound at same time."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "If you try to record a movie of an entertainment app (like Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), you might get a blank video with audio only.

It is the copy right issue.These apps can prevent users from screen recording to protect their content."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "If you cannot open recorded video with any media player, that means recorded video is corrupted. The most common reason is system killed the record-service.

While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "It seems to be a problem of your ROM. Somehow the screencast feature doesn't work.

Please open Settings - Encoder and enable Fix green screen mode. You also should try to record with different resolutions.

If you still get this problem, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com for support."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "It seems to be a problem of WhatsApp's video compression. WhatsApp compresses videos before sharing them. This process ruins some videos. If you can upload videos to Youtube, Facebook without problems, that means the recorded videos are fine.

You should contact WhatsApp to report the problem of video compression."
"video_audio_question_2" : "Why cannot I record system audio (internal sound, game sound)?"
"video_audio_question_3" : "Why is there no sound (audio) when I record a video call?"
"video_audio_question_4" : "Why did I get blank videos with only audio when I record films?"
"video_audio_question_6" : "Why do I always get videos with green screen?"
"video_audio_question_7" : "Why are some videos ruined after sharing via WhatsApp?"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "On Android 5.1, you will get System UI Crash if you select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog.

It is a problem of Android 5.1. Therefore the only way to solve it is reinstall AZ Screen Recorder and remember to not select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Incompatible resolution maybe cause bug like that, so we recommend you to reduce resolution for better recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converting video to GIF with too many frames or too high quality may cause crash.

For control total frames, please select a combination of FPS and length, which gives less than 150 frames.

We recommend to select normal quality (less than 7) and 0.5 scale size."

"crashes_errors_question_4" : "Why did I get crash while converting video to GIF?"

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Here is the procedure of getting premium version back: 

STEP 1. Please open Settings of your device and make sure that you signed in with the main Google Account, which was used for purchase. If you did not, please sign in and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. 

STEP 2. If first step doesn't help, please check: How many Google Accounts are there in Settings of your device? If there is only one, please clear data of Google Play Store and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. If there are several Accounts, please remove all of them except the main Account. Then reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. When you get premium verison back, you can add the removed Accounts back. 

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

If you are using Android 5.0+, maybe your device is in our blacklist. Your device has many problems with screen recording, so we temporarily remove it from list of supported devices.

If you still want to try AZ Screen Recorder, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "If you enabled Show touches in AZ Screen Recorder, it will work after opening app and stop working after exit app. 

We consider that app is exited if user clicks the EXIT (4th) button of the floating control bar. 

In case AZ Screen Recorder is not exited normally and the Show touches continues working, you can disable it by going to Developer Options in Settings of your phone"

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "On some Xiaomi, Meizu… devices POP-UP WINDOW is disabled by default. Therefore the floating control bar of AZ Screen Recorder cannot be shown.

Please open AppInfo of AZ Screen Recorder and grant the POP-UP WINDOW (Alert) permisson>"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Please open Settings - Video Configuration - Orientation. If you plan to record games or other apps with landscape screen, please set Video orientation to Landscape.

If you select Auto orientation, the orientation of recorded video will depend on screen orientation at the moment of start recording."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google doesn't provide API for recording internal audio on Android 5.0 or higher. Therefore currently AZ Screen Recorder only supports recording sound via microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google doesn't allow to access microphone in parallel. That means the Video call app and AZ Screen Recorder can not record sound at same time."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "If you try to record a movie of an entertainment app (like Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), you might get a blank video with audio only.

It is the copy right issue.These apps can prevent users from screen recording to protect their content."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "If you cannot open recorded video with any media player, that means recorded video is corrupted. The most common reason is system killed the record-service.

While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "It seems to be a problem of your ROM. Somehow the screencast feature doesn't work.

Please open Settings - Encoder and enable Fix green screen mode. You also should try to record with different resolutions.

If you still get this problem, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com for support."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "It seems to be a problem of WhatsApp's video compression. WhatsApp compresses videos before sharing them. This process ruins some videos. If you can upload videos to Youtube, Facebook without problems, that means the recorded videos are fine.

You should contact WhatsApp to report the problem of video compression."

"video_audio_question_7" : "Why are some videos ruined after sharing via WhatsApp?"

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "Android 5.1 verzión ilyen hibát fogsz kapni: System UI összeomlás Ha azt választod hogy ne mutasd meg újra a felvétel készítési jogoknál.

Ez az Android 5.1-ben egy probléma. Egy megoldás van: újratelepíteni az AZ Screen Recorder-t és ne válaszd a ne mutasd meg újra opciót az elején ."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Kérlek ellenőrizd milyen enkódert állítottál be. AAz alap nem minden eszközön működik. Válts inkább a Haladó Enkóderre."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "Felvétel közben a videózási folyamat a háttérben fut és kevesebb prioritása van mint a többi alkalmazásnak, amik nem a háttérben futnak.

A képernyő videózás súlyos feladat és szükséges hozzá nagyon sok erőforrás. Emiatt a rendszerednek néha le kell állítania a videózási folyamatot, hogy legyen memória, legyen akkumulátor és más erőforrások a magas prioritású alkalmazásoknak.

Ajánljuk hogy lejjebb vedd a felbontást, a bitrátát és hogy kevesebb legyen a videó hossza, hogy stabilabb legyen."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Videó konvertálása GIF-be túl sok képkockával vagy túl nagy felbontásban összeomlást okozhat.

Ha irányítani akarod a vég képkockaszámot, kérlek válassz ki egy kombinációt ami jó FPS számot és hosszúságot ad, kevesebb mint 150 képkockával.

Ajánljuk, hogy egy normális felbontást válassz (kevesebb mint 7) és 0.5 kicsinyítés méretet."
"crashes_errors_question_2" : "Miért omlik össze az alkalmazás a felvétel indítása után?"
"crashes_errors_question_4" : "Miért kapok összeomlást, mikor GIF-fé konvertálom a videót?"

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Igen, ha megvetted a prémiumot akkor bármelyik eszközön használhatod összes Android 5.0 vagy nagyobb.

Ha a prémiumot szeretnéd használni egy új eszközön, nyisd meg a beállításokat - Felhasználók, aztán lépj be azzal a google fiókoddal amivel megvetted a programot. Azután a Google Play Áruházból töltsd le az AZ Screen Recorder alkalmazást."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Hogyan kaphatod vissza a prémiumodat: 

1. LÉPÉS Kérlek nyisd meg a beállításokat, és ott állítsd be azt a Google fiókot, amivel megvetted az AZ Screen Recorder prémiumot. Utána telepítsd újra az AZ Screen Recorder-t. 

2. LÉPÉS Ha az első lépés nem segít, kérlek ellenőrizd: Mennyi Google fiókod van a beállításokban? Ha csak egy van, akkor töröld ki az adatait a Google Play Áruháznak és telepítsd újra az AZ Screen Recorder alkalmazást. Ha több felhasználó van, töröld ki az összeset, annak az egynek a kivételével, amelyikkel megvetted a programot. Utána telepítsd újra az AZ Screen Recorder-t. Ha visszakaptad a prémiumot, akkor visszaállíthatod a kitörölt felhasználókat. 

3. LÉPÉS Ha egyik lépés sem működik, írj nekünk: az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "Engedélyezünk 3 nap visszatérítési politikát. Ha a 3 napos időszakban vagy, és visszatérítést akarsz, küldj egy e-mailt ide: az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Emlékezz, hogy a megrendelési adatokat is küldd át! Ez tartalmazza a megrendelési azonosítót (Order ID) ID és a vásárlási időt."
"donate_upgrade_question_2" : "Elvesztettem a prémium előfizetésemet. Hogy kaphatnám vissza?"

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "IHa Android 4.4-et vagy alacsonyabbat használsz, akkor nem tudod letölteni az AZ Screen Recorder alkalmazást. Az alkalmazásunk csak Android 5.0 vagy magasabb készülékeken fut.

Ha Android 5.0+ -t használsz, akkor talán az eszközöd a feketelistán van. Az eszközödnek van egy pár problémája a képernyő videózással, tehát ideiglenesen eltávolítjuk a támogatott eszközökből.

Ha nagyon szeretnéd használni a programounkat, kérlek írj ide egy e-mailt: az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "a bekapcsoltad ezt: Érintések mutatása az AZ Screen Recorderben, akkor fog működni ha megnyitod az alkalmazást és akkor áll le ha kilépsz. 

Akkor vagy az alkalmazásból kilépve ha az EXIT-et nyomod meg. (negyedik gomb alul néhány telefonon) 

Sokszor van mikor az AZ Screen Recorder nincs kilépve normális és az Érintések mutatása tovább működik, ki tudod kapcsolni a fejlesztői beállításokban, a telefonod beállításaiban"

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "Néhány Xiamoi és Meizu… eszközökön FELUGRÓ ABLAK alapból ki van kapcsolva. Emiatt az AZ Screen Recorder lebegő eszköztára nem látható.

Kérlek nyisd meg az AlkalmazásInfo-t (AppInfo) az AZ Screen Recorderben és engedélyezd a FELUGRÓ ABLAK(Riadó) jogot"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Kérlek nyisd meg ezt: Beállítások - Videó Beállítások - Tájolás. Ha játékokat, vagy más alkalmazásokat tájban (landscape) szeretnél videózni, kérlek állítsd be Landscape tájolásra

Ha ezt választod: Automatikus tájolás, akkor a tájolás úgy fog változni, ahogy a képernyőd van mikor elkezded a videót."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google nem teszi lehetővé a belső hang felvételét Android 5.0 vagy magasabb rendszereken. Ezért az AZ Screen Recorder csak a mikrofont tudja felvenni."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google nem engedi, hogy párhuzamosan használd a mikrofont. Ez azt jelenti, hogy a videóhívás alkalmazás és az AZ Screen Recorder nem tud egyidőben felvenni."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "Ha egy szórakoztató filmet akarsz felvenni (például: Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), valószínűleg csak hangot fogsz kapni a videódban.

Ez a copyright probléma.Ezek az alkalmazások meg tudják védeni a saját tartalmukat a levideózástól."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "Ha nem tudsz megnyitni egy videót, az azt jelenti, hogy a videó fájl hibás. Általában az történik, hogy a rendszer leállította a videózási folyamatot.

Ha épp videózol, a videózási folyamat a háttérben fut és kevesebb prioritása van mint a többi alkalmazásnak, amik nem a háttérben futnak.

A képernyő videózás súlyos feladat és szükséges hozzá nagyon sok erőforrás. Emiatt a rendszerednek néha le kell állítania a videózási folyamatot, hogy legyen memória, legyen akkumulátor és más erőforrások a magas prioritású alkalmazásoknak.

Ajánljuk hogy lejjebb vedd a felbontást, a bitrátát és hogy kevesebb legyen a videó hossza, hogy stabilabb legyen."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "IEz a probléma a ROM-od miatt van. Valamiért a screencast nem működik.

Értesíthetnéd a gyártót emiatt a probléma miatt."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "IEz a probléma a WhatsApp videó tömörítő miatt van. A WhatsApp letömöríti a videókat a megosztás előtt. Ez a folyamat néhány videót elront. Ha YouTube-ra és Facebookra fel tudsz tölteni videókat hibátlanul, ez azt jelenti hogy a felvett videóid jók, nem hibásak.

Írhatnál a WhatsApp készítőjének ezzel a problémával kapcsolatban."

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "На Android 5.1 Вы можете получить System UI Crash если Вы выбираете Больше не показать в диалоге, который появляется перед стартом записи чтобы спрашивать о праве захвата видео с экрана.

Это проблема у Android 5.1. Поэтому единственная решения - это переустановить AZ Screen Recorder и запомнить не выбрать БОЛЬШЕ НЕ ПОКАЗАТЬ в описанном диалоге."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Несовместимое разрешение может быть причиной такой ошибки, поэтому мы рекомендуем вам уменьшить разрешение для лучшей записи."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "При записи record-служба работает на фоновом режиме и имеет более низкий приоритет по сравнению с другими приложениями, которые работают на экране.

Захват видео с экран является тяжелой задачей и требуется много ресурсов. Поэтому иногда система должна уничтожить record-службу с целью экономии памяти, батареи и других ресурсов для других приложений, имеющих более высокий приоритет.

Мы советуем снижать разрещение, bitrate и длительность видео для более стабильной записи."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Преобразование видео в GIF со слишком много кадров или слишком высоким качеством может приводить к ошибке.

Для контроля числа кадров, выбирайте такую комбинацию FPS и длительности, которая дает меньше 150 кадров.
Мы советуем выбрать нормальное качество (меньше 7) и размер 0.5."

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Да, если Вы купили премиумную версию, Вы можете использовать ее на всех Android 5.0+ устройствах.

Чтобы использовать премиумную версию на новом устройстве, пожалуйста откройте Настройки устройства - потом Аккаунты (Учетные записи) и добавите Google учетную запись, которая была использована для покупки. Потом откройте Play Маркет и установите AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Ниже приведены шаги чтобы вернуть премиумную версию: 

ШАГ 1. Откройте Настройки устройства и убедитесь, что Вы добавили Основную Google учетную запись, которая была использована для покупки. Если эта запись еще не добавлена, добавите ее и переустановить AZ Screen Recorder. 

ШАГ 2. Если первый шаг не помагает, пожалуйста, проверьте: Сколько Google учетных записей в Настройках Вашего устройства? Если всего только одна, очистите данные Goolge Маркета и переустановить AZ Screen Recorder. Если там много, удалите все из них, кроме основной запись. Потом переустановите AZ Screen Recorder. Когда премиумная версия вернется успешно, Вы можете добавить ранше удаленные записи. 

ШАГ 3. Если выше шаги не помогают, пожалуйста, свяжитесь с нами на az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "Мы принимаем 3-дневную политику возврата денежных средств. Если Ваш 3-дневный испытательный период не исчезается и Вы хотите вернуть свои денги, пожалуйста свяжитесь с нами на az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Не забудьте дать нам детали Вашего заказа, включая ID и время покупки."

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "Если Вы используете Android 4.4 или ниже, Вы не можете скачать AZ Screen Recorder. Наше приложение только работает на устройствах с Android 5.0 и выше.

Если Вы испоьзуете Android 5.0+, может быть Ваше устройство является одним из изолированных устройств. Ваше устройство имеет много ошибок с записей экрана, поэтому мы должны изолировать его.

Если Вы сильно хотите попробовать AZ Screen Recorder, пожалуйста, связаться с нами на az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "Если функция Показать нажатия включена в AZ Screen Recorder, она начинает работать после открытия и прекратит работу после закрытия приложения. 

Мы считаем, что приложение закрыто если пользователь нажал кнопку ВЫХОД (четвертую) у панели управления. 

В ситуации, где AZ Screen Recorder было закрыто и функция SПоказать нажатия продожает свою работу, Вы можете выключить ее в разделе Параметры разработчика в Настройках"

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "На некоторых Xiaomi, Meizu… устройствах POP-UP WINDOW было выключено по умолчанию. Поэтому панель управления у AZ Screen Recorder не показывается.

Пожалуйста, откройте страницу Сведения о приложения AZ Screen Recorder и разрешите POP-UP WINDOW (Alert)>"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Пожалуйста, откройте Настройки - Видео конфигурация - Ориентация. Если Вы намерены записывать игры или другие приложения с горизотальным экраном, пожалуйста, выбирайте Ландшафтную ориентацию.

Если Вы выбираете Автоматически, ориентация записанных видео зависит от ориентации экрана в момент старта записи."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google не обеспечивает API для записи внутреннего звука на Android 5.0 или выше. Поэтому сейчас AZ Screen Recorder только записывает звук через микрофон."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google не позволяет использовать микрофон паралелльно. Это значит, что Видеовстреча и AZ Screen Recorder не могут записывать звук в одное время."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "Если Вы пытаетесь записать фильмы у развлекательных приложений (на пример Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), может быть Вы будете получать пустое видое с только аудио..

Это связно с авторскими правами. Такие приложения могут запретить пользователям записать экран для защиты их соддержаний"

"video_audio_answer_5" : "Если Вы не можете открыть записанные видео с помощью плееров, это значит, что эти видео были разрушены. Самая часто встречающаяся причина - encode-служба была удалена системой.
При записи encode-служба работает на фоновом режиме и имеет более низкий приоритет по сравнению с другими приложениями, которые работают на экране.

Захват видео с экран является тяжелой задачей и требуется много ресурсов. Поэтому иногда система должна уничтожить encode-службу с целью экономии памяти, батареи и других ресурсов для других приложений, имеющих более высокий приоритет.

Мы советуем снижать разрещение, bitrate и длительность видео для более стабильной записи."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "Это проблема у Вашего устройства. По какой-то причине screen recording функция плохо работает.

Пожалуйста, откройте Настройки - Кодер и включите режим Исправлять ошибку зеленого экрана. Вам также попробуйте записывать экран с разными разрешениями.

Если выше описанные советы не помогают, свяжитесь с нами по az.screen.recorder@gmail.com для поддержки."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "Это проблема у WhatsApp видео-сжатия. WhatsApp сжимает видео перед передачей. Этот процесс снижает какчество видео. Если Вы можете поделить видео через Youtube, Facebook нормально, это значит, что записанные видео хорошие.

Вам нужно связаться с WhatsApp, чтобы сообщить проблему видео-сжатия."

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "On Android 5.1, you will get System UI Crash if you select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog.

It is a problem of Android 5.1. Therefore the only way to solve it is reinstall AZ Screen Recorder and remember to not select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Incompatible resolution maybe cause bug like that, so we recommend you to reduce resolution for better recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converting video to GIF with too many frames or too high quality may cause crash.

For control total frames, please select a combination of FPS and length, which gives less than 150 frames.

We recommend to select normal quality (less than 7) and 0.5 scale size."

"crashes_errors_question_2" : "Why does app crash immediately after start recording?"
"crashes_errors_question_4" : "Why did I get crash while converting video to GIF?"

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Yes, if you bought premium version, you can use it on all Android 5.0+ devices.

To use premium version on a new device, please open Settings of device - Accounts and sign in with the Google Account that was used for purchase. Then go to Google Play Store and install AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Here is the procedure of getting premium version back: 

STEP 1. Please open Settings of your device and make sure that you signed in with the main Google Account, which was used for purchase. If you did not, please sign in and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. 

STEP 2. If first step doesn't help, please check: How many Google Accounts are there in Settings of your device? If there is only one, please clear data of Google Play Store and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. If there are several Accounts, please remove all of them except the main Account. Then reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. When you get premium verison back, you can add the removed Accounts back. 

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "We apply 3 days refund policy. If you are still in the 3 days trial period and you want a refund, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Remember to give us your order details including order ID and purchase time."

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Please open Settings - Video Configuration - Orientation. If you plan to record games or other apps with landscape screen, please set Video orientation to Landscape.

If you select Auto orientation, the orientation of recorded video will depend on screen orientation at the moment of start recording."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google doesn't provide API for recording internal audio on Android 5.0 or higher. Therefore currently AZ Screen Recorder only supports recording sound via microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google doesn't allow to access microphone in parallel. That means the Video call app and AZ Screen Recorder can not record sound at same time."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "If you try to record a movie of an entertainment app (like Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), you might get a blank video with audio only.

It is the copy right issue.These apps can prevent users from screen recording to protect their content."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "If you cannot open recorded video with any media player, that means recorded video is corrupted. The most common reason is system killed the record-service.

While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "It seems to be a problem of your ROM. Somehow the screencast feature doesn't work.

Please open Settings - Encoder and enable Fix green screen mode. You also should try to record with different resolutions.

If you still get this problem, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com for support."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "It seems to be a problem of WhatsApp's video compression. WhatsApp compresses videos before sharing them. This process ruins some videos. If you can upload videos to Youtube, Facebook without problems, that means the recorded videos are fine.

You should contact WhatsApp to report the problem of video compression."

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "On Android 5.1, you will get System UI Crash if you select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog.

It is a problem of Android 5.1. Therefore the only way to solve it is reinstall AZ Screen Recorder and remember to not select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Incompatible resolution maybe cause bug like that, so we recommend you to reduce resolution for better recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converting video to GIF with too many frames or too high quality may cause crash.

For control total frames, please select a combination of FPS and length, which gives less than 150 frames.

We recommend to select normal quality (less than 7) and 0.5 scale size."

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Yes, if you bought premium version, you can use it on all Android 5.0+ devices.

To use premium version on a new device, please open Settings of device - Accounts and sign in with the Google Account that was used for purchase. Then go to Google Play Store and install AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Here is the procedure of getting premium version back: 

STEP 1. Please open Settings of your device and make sure that you signed in with the main Google Account, which was used for purchase. If you did not, please sign in and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. 

STEP 2. If first step doesn't help, please check: How many Google Accounts are there in Settings of your device? If there is only one, please clear data of Google Play Store and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. If there are several Accounts, please remove all of them except the main Account. Then reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. When you get premium verison back, you can add the removed Accounts back. 

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "We apply 3 days refund policy. If you are still in the 3 days trial period and you want a refund, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Remember to give us your order details including order ID and purchase time."

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "On Android 5.1, you will get System UI Crash if you select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog.

It is a problem of Android 5.1. Therefore the only way to solve it is reinstall AZ Screen Recorder and remember to not select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Incompatible resolution maybe cause bug like that, so we recommend you to reduce resolution for better recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converting video to GIF with too many frames or too high quality may cause crash.

For control total frames, please select a combination of FPS and length, which gives less than 150 frames.

We recommend to select normal quality (less than 7) and 0.5 scale size."
"crashes_errors_question_1" : "Why do I get System UI crash on Android 5.1?"
"crashes_errors_question_2" : "Why does app crash immediately after start recording?"
"crashes_errors_question_4" : "Why did I get crash while converting video to GIF?"

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Yes, if you bought premium version, you can use it on all Android 5.0+ devices.

To use premium version on a new device, please open Settings of device - Accounts and sign in with the Google Account that was used for purchase. Then go to Google Play Store and install AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Here is the procedure of getting premium version back: 

STEP 1. Please open Settings of your device and make sure that you signed in with the main Google Account, which was used for purchase. If you did not, please sign in and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. 

STEP 2. If first step doesn't help, please check: How many Google Accounts are there in Settings of your device? If there is only one, please clear data of Google Play Store and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. If there are several Accounts, please remove all of them except the main Account. Then reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. When you get premium verison back, you can add the removed Accounts back. 

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "We apply 3 days refund policy. If you are still in the 3 days trial period and you want a refund, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Remember to give us your order details including order ID and purchase time."
"donate_upgrade_question_1" : "Can I use premium version on different devices?"
"donate_upgrade_question_2" : "I lost premium version. How can I get it back?"

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "If you are using Android 4.4 or lower, you cannot download AZ Screen Recorder. Our app is only available for devices running Android 5.0 or higher.

If you are using Android 5.0+, maybe your device is in our blacklist. Your device has many problems with screen recording, so we temporarily remove it from list of supported devices.

If you still want to try AZ Screen Recorder, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "If you enabled Show touches in AZ Screen Recorder, it will work after opening app and stop working after exit app. 

We consider that app is exited if user clicks the EXIT (4th) button of the floating control bar. 

In case AZ Screen Recorder is not exited normally and the Show touches continues working, you can disable it by going to Developer Options in Settings of your phone"

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "On some Xiaomi, Meizu… devices POP-UP WINDOW is disabled by default. Therefore the floating control bar of AZ Screen Recorder cannot be shown.

Please open AppInfo of AZ Screen Recorder and grant the POP-UP WINDOW (Alert) permisson>"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Please open Settings - Video Configuration - Orientation. If you plan to record games or other apps with landscape screen, please set Video orientation to Landscape.

If you select Auto orientation, the orientation of recorded video will depend on screen orientation at the moment of start recording."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google doesn't provide API for recording internal audio on Android 5.0 or higher. Therefore currently AZ Screen Recorder only supports recording sound via microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google doesn't allow to access microphone in parallel. That means the Video call app and AZ Screen Recorder can not record sound at same time."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "If you try to record a movie of an entertainment app (like Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), you might get a blank video with audio only.

It is the copy right issue.These apps can prevent users from screen recording to protect their content."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "If you cannot open recorded video with any media player, that means recorded video is corrupted. The most common reason is system killed the record-service.

While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "It seems to be a problem of your ROM. Somehow the screencast feature doesn't work.

Please open Settings - Encoder and enable Fix green screen mode. You also should try to record with different resolutions.

If you still get this problem, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com for support."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "It seems to be a problem of WhatsApp's video compression. WhatsApp compresses videos before sharing them. This process ruins some videos. If you can upload videos to Youtube, Facebook without problems, that means the recorded videos are fine.

You should contact WhatsApp to report the problem of video compression."

"crashes_errors_answer_1" : "On Android 5.1, you will get System UI Crash if you select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog.

It is a problem of Android 5.1. Therefore the only way to solve it is reinstall AZ Screen Recorder and remember to not select Don't show again in the capture permission dialog."
"crashes_errors_answer_2" : "Incompatible resolution maybe cause bug like that, so we recommend you to reduce resolution for better recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_3" : "While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"crashes_errors_answer_4" : "Converting video to GIF with too many frames or too high quality may cause crash.

For control total frames, please select a combination of FPS and length, which gives less than 150 frames.

We recommend to select normal quality (less than 7) and 0.5 scale size."

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Yes, if you bought premium version, you can use it on all Android 5.0+ devices.

To use premium version on a new device, please open Settings of device - Accounts and sign in with the Google Account that was used for purchase. Then go to Google Play Store and install AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Here is the procedure of getting premium version back: 

STEP 1. Please open Settings of your device and make sure that you signed in with the main Google Account, which was used for purchase. If you did not, please sign in and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. 

STEP 2. If first step doesn't help, please check: How many Google Accounts are there in Settings of your device? If there is only one, please clear data of Google Play Store and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. If there are several Accounts, please remove all of them except the main Account. Then reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. When you get premium verison back, you can add the removed Accounts back. 

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "We apply 3 days refund policy. If you are still in the 3 days trial period and you want a refund, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Remember to give us your order details including order ID and purchase time."
"donate_upgrade_question_1" : "Can I use premium version on different devices?"
"donate_upgrade_question_2" : "I lost premium version. How can I get it back?"

"donate_upgrade_answer_1" : "Yes, if you bought premium version, you can use it on all Android 5.0+ devices.

To use premium version on a new device, please open Settings of device - Accounts and sign in with the Google Account that was used for purchase. Then go to Google Play Store and install AZ Screen Recorder."

"donate_upgrade_answer_2" : "Here is the procedure of getting premium version back: 

STEP 1. Please open Settings of your device and make sure that you signed in with the main Google Account, which was used for purchase. If you did not, please sign in and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. 

STEP 2. If first step doesn't help, please check: How many Google Accounts are there in Settings of your device? If there is only one, please clear data of Google Play Store and reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. If there are several Accounts, please remove all of them except the main Account. Then reinstall AZ Screen Recorder. When you get premium verison back, you can add the removed Accounts back. 

STEP 3. If both steps above don't help, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com."

"donate_upgrade_answer_3" : "We apply 3 days refund policy. If you are still in the 3 days trial period and you want a refund, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com.

Remember to give us your order details including order ID and purchase time."
"donate_upgrade_question_1" : "Can I use premium version on different devices?"
"donate_upgrade_question_2" : "I lost premium version. How can I get it back?"

"other_faqs_answer_1" : "If you are using Android 4.4 or lower, you cannot download AZ Screen Recorder. Our app is only available for devices running Android 5.0 or higher.

If you are using Android 5.0+, maybe your device is in our blacklist. Your device has many problems with screen recording, so we temporarily remove it from list of supported devices.

If you still want to try AZ Screen Recorder, please send us an email to az.screen.recorder@gmail.com"

"other_faqs_answer_2" : "If you enabled Show touches in AZ Screen Recorder, it will work after opening app and stop working after exit app. 

We consider that app is exited if user clicks the EXIT (4th) button of the floating control bar. 

In case AZ Screen Recorder is not exited normally and the Show touches continues working, you can disable it by going to Developer Options in Settings of your phone"

"other_faqs_answer_3" : "On some Xiaomi, Meizu… devices POP-UP WINDOW is disabled by default. Therefore the floating control bar of AZ Screen Recorder cannot be shown.

Please open AppInfo of AZ Screen Recorder and grant the POP-UP WINDOW (Alert) permisson>"

"translators_msg" : "Si crees que puedes ayudarnos a traducir AZ Screen Recorder a tu lenguaje o encontraste un error, déjanos saber"

"video_audio_answer_1" : "Please open Settings - Video Configuration - Orientation. If you plan to record games or other apps with landscape screen, please set Video orientation to Landscape.

If you select Auto orientation, the orientation of recorded video will depend on screen orientation at the moment of start recording."
"video_audio_answer_2" : "Google doesn't provide API for recording internal audio on Android 5.0 or higher. Therefore currently AZ Screen Recorder only supports recording sound via microphone."
"video_audio_answer_3" : "Google doesn't allow to access microphone in parallel. That means the Video call app and AZ Screen Recorder can not record sound at same time."

"video_audio_answer_4" : "If you try to record a movie of an entertainment app (like Netflix, Telly, OSN Play…), you might get a blank video with audio only.

It is the copy right issue.These apps can prevent users from screen recording to protect their content."

"video_audio_answer_5" : "If you cannot open recorded video with any media player, that means recorded video is corrupted. The most common reason is system killed the record-service.

While recording the record-service runs in background and has lower priority than other apps, which run foreground.

Screen recording is a heavy task and requires a lot of resources. Therefore sometimes your system must kill the record-service for saving memory, battery and other resources for higher priority apps.

We recommend to reduce the resolution, bitrate and length of video for more stable recording."

"video_audio_answer_6" : "It seems to be a problem of your ROM. Somehow the screencast feature doesn't work.

Please open Settings - Encoder and enable Fix green screen mode. You also should try to record with different resolutions.

If you still get this problem, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com for support."

"video_audio_answer_7" : "It seems to be a problem of WhatsApp's video compression. WhatsApp compresses videos before sharing them. This process ruins some videos. If you can upload videos to Youtube, Facebook without problems, that means the recorded videos are fine.

You should contact WhatsApp to report the problem of video compression."

"video_audio_question_4" : "Why did I get blank videos with only audio when I record films?"
"video_audio_question_6" : "Why do I always get videos with green screen?"
"video_audio_question_7" : "Why are some videos ruined after sharing via WhatsApp?"

playstore_details.title: AZ Screen Recorder - Video Recorder, Livestream
playstore_details.description:
Featured on Google Play Home Page, Android Police, Yahoo News, CNET, Android Central, Droid-Life, and more.
AZ Screen Recorder is a stable, high-quality screen recorder for Android that helps you record smooth & clear screen videos. With a ton of features like screen capture, screen video recorder, video editor, live stream screen, this screen recording app provides an easy way to record screen videos such as video tutorials, video calls, game videos, live shows, and videos that can not be downloaded.
Advantages:
HIGH-QUALITY video: 1080p, 12Mbps, 60FPS
NO recording time limit
NO root needed
Key features:
★ Screen recording
AZ Screen Recorder provides stable and fluid screen recording. With this screen recorder, you can easily record popular mobile game videos; you can record video calls with family and friends; and you can also record live shows from Periscope, Bigo Live or Tik Tok, YouTube, Twitch...

Screen Video Recorder with internal sound
From Android 10, this free screen recorder will support recording internal audio. If you want to record gameplay, video tutorial with internal audio, this powerful screen recorder with audio is the best choice for you.

Game Recorder in FULL HD
This game recorder supports the recording game screen in high quality: 1080p, 60FPS, 12Mbps. Many resolutions, frame rates, and bit rates are available for you.

Screen Recorder with Facecam
By using this Screen Recorder with Facecam, your face and emotions can be recorded in a small overlay window. You can freely adjust the Facecam size and drag it to any position on the screen

AZ Screen Recorder provides a ton of free features:
- Record internal sound (from Android 10)
- Record gameplay with external sound
- Pause/resume screen recording
- Enable front camera (Facecam)
- GIF maker: A GIF recorder help you record the screen as GIF
- Control screen recording through floating window or notification bar
- Shake the device to stop recording the screen
- Draw on the screen while recording gameplay
- Transfer recorded videos, and screenshots to your computer through Wifi

★ Video Editor
After recording device screen, you can edit your videos with these editing functions:
- Convert video to GIF
- Trim video
- Remove middle part of video
- Merge videos: Combine multiple videos into one
- Add background music to video
- Add subtitles to video
- Extract image from video
- Crop video
- Rotate video
- Compress video
- Edit audio

★ Livestream
With the screen broadcast function of the AZ Screen Recorder, you can stream your screen to Youtube, Facebook, Twitch, and more.  You can stream gameplay to show your skills or stream films, TV shows, and sports events. AZ Screen Recorder provides the following features to help you livestream easily:
- Several broadcast resolution settings, stream with the high quality you want
- Facecam while live streaming

★ Screenshots and Image Editing
AZ Screen Recorder is more than a screen video recorder. It can also capture screenshots and edit images. You can take a screenshot easily with one click, use in-app image editing tools to stitch/crop images, and share your screenshots with your friends. Some top editing features can be listed below:
- Stitch images: Auto detect and combine several images into one
- Crop images: Remove unwanted parts
- Blur image: pixelate areas you don’t want to show
- Add text, and draw on image…

Thanks for downloading AZ Screen Recorder. If you have any feedback, bug reports, suggestions, or you can help with the translations, please contact us at az.screen.recorder@gmail.com

Subscribe to our Youtube channel:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UClv3w8p-lJJYkCieeYeigbg
Follow us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/az.screen.recorder

* Disclaimer: This app is not associated with Tik Tok, Periscope, Bigo Live, Facebook, Youtube, Twitch, or any other social media platforms.
